139 template<class T>
140 optional<T> maybe_id( const string& name_or_id )
141 {
142  if( std::isdigit( name_or_id.front() ) )
143  {
144  try
145  {
146  return fc::variant(name_or_id, 1).as<T>(1);
147  }
148  catch (const fc::exception&)
149  { // not an ID
150  }
151  }
152  return optional<T>();
153 }

155 string address_to_shorthash( const address& addr )
156 {
157  uint32_t x = addr.addr._hash[0];
158  static const char hd[] = "0123456789abcdef";
159  string result;
160 
161  result += hd[(x >> 0x1c) & 0x0f];
162  result += hd[(x >> 0x18) & 0x0f];
163  result += hd[(x >> 0x14) & 0x0f];
164  result += hd[(x >> 0x10) & 0x0f];
165  result += hd[(x >> 0x0c) & 0x0f];
166  result += hd[(x >> 0x08) & 0x0f];
167  result += hd[(x >> 0x04) & 0x0f];
168  result += hd[(x ) & 0x0f];
169 
170  return result;
171 }

173 fc::ecc::private_key derive_private_key( const std::string& prefix_string,
174  int sequence_number )
175 {
176  std::string sequence_string = std::to_string(sequence_number);
177  fc::sha512 h = fc::sha512::hash(prefix_string + " " + sequence_string);
178  fc::ecc::private_key derived_key = fc::ecc::private_key::regenerate(fc::sha256::hash(h));
179  return derived_key;
180 }

182 string normalize_brain_key( string s )
183 {
184  size_t i = 0, n = s.length();
185  std::string result;
186  char c;
187  result.reserve( n );
188 
189  bool preceded_by_whitespace = false;
190  bool non_empty = false;
191  while( i < n )
192  {
193  c = s[i++];
194  switch( c )
195  {
196  case ' ': case '\t': case '\r': case '\n': case '\v': case '\f':
197  preceded_by_whitespace = true;
198  continue;
199 
200  case 'a': c = 'A'; break;
201  case 'b': c = 'B'; break;
202  case 'c': c = 'C'; break;
203  case 'd': c = 'D'; break;
204  case 'e': c = 'E'; break;
205  case 'f': c = 'F'; break;
206  case 'g': c = 'G'; break;
207  case 'h': c = 'H'; break;
208  case 'i': c = 'I'; break;
209  case 'j': c = 'J'; break;
210  case 'k': c = 'K'; break;
211  case 'l': c = 'L'; break;
212  case 'm': c = 'M'; break;
213  case 'n': c = 'N'; break;
214  case 'o': c = 'O'; break;
215  case 'p': c = 'P'; break;
216  case 'q': c = 'Q'; break;
217  case 'r': c = 'R'; break;
218  case 's': c = 'S'; break;
219  case 't': c = 'T'; break;
220  case 'u': c = 'U'; break;
221  case 'v': c = 'V'; break;
222  case 'w': c = 'W'; break;
223  case 'x': c = 'X'; break;
224  case 'y': c = 'Y'; break;
225  case 'z': c = 'Z'; break;
226 
227  default:
228  break;
229  }
230  if( preceded_by_whitespace && non_empty )
231  result.push_back(' ');
232  result.push_back(c);
233  preceded_by_whitespace = false;
234  non_empty = true;
235  }
236  return result;
237 }
238 
239 struct op_prototype_visitor
240 {
241  typedef void result_type;
242 
243  int t = 0;
244  flat_map< std::string, operation >& name2op;
245 
246  op_prototype_visitor(
247  int _t,
248  flat_map< std::string, operation >& _prototype_ops
249  ):t(_t), name2op(_prototype_ops) {}
250 
251  template<typename Type>
252  result_type operator()( const Type& op )const
253  {
254  string name = fc::get_typename<Type>::name();
255  size_t p = name.rfind(':');
256  if( p != string::npos )
257  name = name.substr( p+1 );
258  name2op[ name ] = Type();
259  }
260 };

262 class wallet_api_impl
263 {
264 public:
265  api_documentation method_documentation;
266 private:
267  void claim_registered_account(const account_object& account)
268  {
269  auto it = _wallet.pending_account_registrations.find( account.name );
270  FC_ASSERT( it != _wallet.pending_account_registrations.end() );
271  for (const std::string& wif_key : it->second)
272  if( !import_key( account.name, wif_key ) )
273  {
274  // somebody else beat our pending registration, there is
275  // nothing we can do except log it and move on
276  elog( "account ${name} registered by someone else first!",
277  ("name", account.name) );
278  // might as well remove it from pending regs,
279  // because there is now no way this registration
280  // can become valid (even in the extremely rare
281  // possibility of migrating to a fork where the
282  // name is available, the user can always
283  // manually re-register)
284  }
285  _wallet.pending_account_registrations.erase( it );
286  }
287 
288  // after a witness registration succeeds, this saves the private key in the wallet permanently
289  //
290  void claim_registered_witness(const std::string& witness_name)
291  {
292  auto iter = _wallet.pending_witness_registrations.find(witness_name);
293  FC_ASSERT(iter != _wallet.pending_witness_registrations.end());
294  std::string wif_key = iter->second;
295 
296  // get the list key id this key is registered with in the chain
297  fc::optional<fc::ecc::private_key> witness_private_key = wif_to_key(wif_key);
298  FC_ASSERT(witness_private_key);
299 
300  auto pub_key = witness_private_key->get_public_key();
301  _keys[pub_key] = wif_key;
302  _wallet.pending_witness_registrations.erase(iter);
303  }
304 
305  fc::mutex _resync_mutex;
306  void resync()
307  {
308  fc::scoped_lock<fc::mutex> lock(_resync_mutex);
309  // this method is used to update wallet_data annotations
310  // e.g. wallet has been restarted and was not notified
311  // of events while it was down
312  //
313  // everything that is done "incremental style" when a push
314  // notification is received, should also be done here
315  // "batch style" by querying the blockchain
316 
317  if( !_wallet.pending_account_registrations.empty() )
318  {
319  // make a vector of the account names pending registration
320  std::vector<string> pending_account_names = boost::copy_range<std::vector<string> >(boost::adaptors::keys(_wallet.pending_account_registrations));
321 
322  // look those up on the blockchain
323  std::vector<fc::optional<graphene::chain::account_object >>
324  pending_account_objects = _remote_db->lookup_account_names( pending_account_names );
325 
326  // if any of them exist, claim them
327  for( const fc::optional<graphene::chain::account_object>& optional_account : pending_account_objects )
328  if( optional_account )
329  claim_registered_account(*optional_account);
330  }
331 
332  if (!_wallet.pending_witness_registrations.empty())
333  {
334  // make a vector of the owner accounts for witnesses pending registration
335  std::vector<string> pending_witness_names = boost::copy_range<std::vector<string> >(boost::adaptors::keys(_wallet.pending_witness_registrations));
336 
337  // look up the owners on the blockchain
338  std::vector<fc::optional<graphene::chain::account_object>> owner_account_objects = _remote_db->lookup_account_names(pending_witness_names);
339 
340  // if any of them have registered witnesses, claim them
341  for( const fc::optional<graphene::chain::account_object>& optional_account : owner_account_objects )
342  if (optional_account)
343  {
344  std::string account_id = account_id_to_string(optional_account->id);
345  fc::optional<witness_object> witness_obj = _remote_db->get_witness_by_account(account_id);
346  if (witness_obj)
347  claim_registered_witness(optional_account->name);
348  }
349  }
350  }

352  void enable_umask_protection()
353  {
354 #ifdef __unix__
355  _old_umask = umask( S_IRWXG | S_IRWXO );
356 #endif
357  }
358 
359  void disable_umask_protection()
360  {
361 #ifdef __unix__
362  umask( _old_umask );
363 #endif
364  }
365 
366  void init_prototype_ops()
367  {
368  operation op;
369  for( int t=0; t<op.count(); t++ )
370  {
371  op.set_which( t );
372  op.visit( op_prototype_visitor(t, _prototype_ops) );
373  }
374  return;
375  }

377  map<transaction_handle_type, signed_transaction> _builder_transactions;
378 
379  // if the user executes the same command twice in quick succession,
380  // we might generate the same transaction id, and cause the second
381  // transaction to be rejected. This can be avoided by altering the
382  // second transaction slightly (bumping up the expiration time by
383  // a second). Keep track of recent transaction ids we've generated
384  // so we can know if we need to do this
385  struct recently_generated_transaction_record
386  {
387  fc::time_point_sec generation_time;
388  graphene::chain::transaction_id_type transaction_id;
389  };
390  struct timestamp_index{};
391  typedef boost::multi_index_container<recently_generated_transaction_record,
392  boost::multi_index::indexed_by<boost::multi_index::hashed_unique<boost::multi_index::member<recently_generated_transaction_record,
393  graphene::chain::transaction_id_type,
394  &recently_generated_transaction_record::transaction_id>,
395  std::hash<graphene::chain::transaction_id_type> >,
396  boost::multi_index::ordered_non_unique<boost::multi_index::tag<timestamp_index>,
397  boost::multi_index::member<recently_generated_transaction_record, fc::time_point_sec, &recently_generated_transaction_record::generation_time> > > > recently_generated_transaction_set_type;
398  recently_generated_transaction_set_type _recently_generated_transactions;
399 
400 public:
401  wallet_api& self;
402  wallet_api_impl( wallet_api& s, const wallet_data& initial_data, fc::api<login_api> rapi )
403  : self(s),
404  _chain_id(initial_data.chain_id),
405  _remote_api(rapi),
406  _remote_db(rapi->database()),
407  _remote_net_broadcast(rapi->network_broadcast()),
408  _remote_hist(rapi->history())
409  {
410  chain_id_type remote_chain_id = _remote_db->get_chain_id();
411  if( remote_chain_id != _chain_id )
412  {
413  FC_THROW( "Remote server gave us an unexpected chain_id",
414  ("remote_chain_id", remote_chain_id)
415  ("chain_id", _chain_id) );
416  }
417  init_prototype_ops();
418 
419  _remote_db->set_block_applied_callback( [this](const variant& block_id )
420  {
421  on_block_applied( block_id );
422  } );
423 
424  _wallet.chain_id = _chain_id;
425  _wallet.ws_server = initial_data.ws_server;
426  _wallet.ws_user = initial_data.ws_user;
427  _wallet.ws_password = initial_data.ws_password;
428  }
429  virtual ~wallet_api_impl()
430  {
431  try
432  {
433  _remote_db->cancel_all_subscriptions();
434  }
435  catch (const fc::exception& e)
436  {
437  // Right now the wallet_api has no way of knowing if the connection to the
438  // witness has already disconnected (via the witness node exiting first).
439  // If it has exited, cancel_all_subscriptsions() will throw and there's
440  // nothing we can do about it.
441  // dlog("Caught exception ${e} while canceling database subscriptions", ("e", e));
442  }
443  }

445  void encrypt_keys()
446  {
447  if( !is_locked() )
448  {
449  plain_keys data;
450  data.keys = _keys;
451  data.checksum = _checksum;
452  auto plain_txt = fc::raw::pack(data);
453  _wallet.cipher_keys = fc::aes_encrypt( data.checksum, plain_txt );
454  }
455  }
456 
457  void on_block_applied( const variant& block_id )
458  {
459  fc::async([this]{resync();}, "Resync after block");
460  }
461 
462  bool copy_wallet_file( string destination_filename )
463  {
464  fc::path src_path = get_wallet_filename();
465  if( !fc::exists( src_path ) )
466  return false;
467  fc::path dest_path = destination_filename + _wallet_filename_extension;
468  int suffix = 0;
469  while( fc::exists(dest_path) )
470  {
471  ++suffix;
472  dest_path = destination_filename + "-" + to_string( suffix ) + _wallet_filename_extension;
473  }
474  wlog( "backing up wallet ${src} to ${dest}",
475  ("src", src_path)
476  ("dest", dest_path) );
477 
478  fc::path dest_parent = fc::absolute(dest_path).parent_path();
479  try
480  {
481  enable_umask_protection();
482  if( !fc::exists( dest_parent ) )
483  fc::create_directories( dest_parent );
484  fc::copy( src_path, dest_path );
485  disable_umask_protection();
486  }
487  catch(...)
488  {
489  disable_umask_protection();
490  throw;
491  }
492  return true;
493  }
494 
495  bool is_locked()const
496  {
497  return _checksum == fc::sha512();

513  variant info() const
514  {
515  auto chain_props = get_chain_properties();
516  auto global_props = get_global_properties();
517  auto dynamic_props = get_dynamic_global_properties();
518  fc::mutable_variant_object result;
519  result["head_block_num"] = dynamic_props.head_block_number;
520  result["head_block_id"] = fc::variant(dynamic_props.head_block_id, 1);
521  result["head_block_age"] = fc::get_approximate_relative_time_string(dynamic_props.time,
522  time_point_sec(time_point::now()),
523  " old");
524  result["next_maintenance_time"] = fc::get_approximate_relative_time_string(dynamic_props.next_maintenance_time);
525  result["chain_id"] = chain_props.chain_id;
526  result["participation"] = (100*dynamic_props.recent_slots_filled.popcount()) / 128.0;
527  result["active_witnesses"] = fc::variant(global_props.active_witnesses, GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS);
528  result["active_committee_members"] = fc::variant(global_props.active_committee_members, GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS);
529  return result;
530  }
531 
532  variant_object about() const
533  {
534  string client_version( graphene::utilities::git_revision_description );
535  const size_t pos = client_version.find( '/' );
536  if( pos != string::npos && client_version.size() > pos )
537  client_version = client_version.substr( pos + 1 );
538 
539  fc::mutable_variant_object result;
540  //result["blockchain_name"] = BLOCKCHAIN_NAME;
541  //result["blockchain_description"] = BTS_BLOCKCHAIN_DESCRIPTION;
542  result["client_version"] = client_version;
543  result["graphene_revision"] = graphene::utilities::git_revision_sha;
544  result["graphene_revision_age"] = fc::get_approximate_relative_time_string( fc::time_point_sec( graphene::utilities::git_revision_unix_timestamp ) );
545  result["fc_revision"] = fc::git_revision_sha;
546  result["fc_revision_age"] = fc::get_approximate_relative_time_string( fc::time_point_sec( fc::git_revision_unix_timestamp ) );
547  result["compile_date"] = "compiled on " __DATE__ " at " __TIME__;
548  result["boost_version"] = boost::replace_all_copy(std::string(BOOST_LIB_VERSION), "_", ".");
549  result["openssl_version"] = OPENSSL_VERSION_TEXT;
550 
551  std::string bitness = boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(8 * sizeof(int*)) + "-bit";
552 #if defined(__APPLE__)
553  std::string os = "osx";
554 #elif defined(__linux__)
555  std::string os = "linux";
556 #elif defined(_MSC_VER)
557  std::string os = "win32";
558 #else
559  std::string os = "other";
560 #endif
561  result["build"] = os + " " + bitness;
562 
563  return result;
564  }

578  std::string account_id_to_string(account_id_type id) const
579  {
580  std::string account_id = fc::to_string(id.space_id)
581  + "." + fc::to_string(id.type_id)
582  + "." + fc::to_string(id.instance.value);
583  return account_id;
584  }
585  account_object get_account(account_id_type id) const
586  {
587  std::string account_id = account_id_to_string(id);
588 
589  auto rec = _remote_db->get_accounts({account_id}).front();
590  FC_ASSERT(rec);
591  return *rec;
592  }
593  account_object get_account(string account_name_or_id) const
594  {
595  FC_ASSERT( account_name_or_id.size() > 0 );
596 
597  if( auto id = maybe_id<account_id_type>(account_name_or_id) )
598  {
599  // It's an ID
600  return get_account(*id);
601  } else {
602  auto rec = _remote_db->lookup_account_names({account_name_or_id}).front();
603  FC_ASSERT( rec && rec->name == account_name_or_id );
604  return *rec;
605  }
606  }
607  account_id_type get_account_id(string account_name_or_id) const
608  {
609  return get_account(account_name_or_id).get_id();
610  }
611  optional<asset_object> find_asset(asset_id_type id)const
612  {
613  auto rec = _remote_db->get_assets({id}).front();
614  return rec;
615  }
616  optional<asset_object> find_asset(string asset_symbol_or_id)const
617  {
618  FC_ASSERT( asset_symbol_or_id.size() > 0 );
619 
620  if( auto id = maybe_id<asset_id_type>(asset_symbol_or_id) )
621  {
622  // It's an ID
623  return find_asset(*id);
624  } else {
625  // It's a symbol
626  auto rec = _remote_db->lookup_asset_symbols({asset_symbol_or_id}).front();
627  if( rec )
628  {
629  if( rec->symbol != asset_symbol_or_id )
630  return optional<asset_object>();
631  }
632  return rec;
633  }
634  }
635  asset_object get_asset(asset_id_type id)const
636  {
637  auto opt = find_asset(id);
638  FC_ASSERT(opt);
639  return *opt;
640  }
641  asset_object get_asset(string asset_symbol_or_id)const
642  {
643  auto opt = find_asset(asset_symbol_or_id);
644  FC_ASSERT(opt);
645  return *opt;
646  }
647 
648  asset_id_type get_asset_id(string asset_symbol_or_id) const
649  {
650  FC_ASSERT( asset_symbol_or_id.size() > 0 );
651  vector<optional<asset_object>> opt_asset;
652  if( std::isdigit( asset_symbol_or_id.front() ) )
653  return fc::variant(asset_symbol_or_id, 1).as<asset_id_type>( 1 );
654  opt_asset = _remote_db->lookup_asset_symbols( {asset_symbol_or_id} );
655  FC_ASSERT( (opt_asset.size() > 0) && (opt_asset[0].valid()) );
656  return opt_asset[0]->id;
657  }

659  string get_wallet_filename() const
660  {
661  return _wallet_filename;
662  }

664  fc::ecc::private_key get_private_key(const public_key_type& id)const
665  {
666  auto it = _keys.find(id);
667  FC_ASSERT( it != _keys.end() );
668 
669  fc::optional< fc::ecc::private_key > privkey = wif_to_key( it->second );
670  FC_ASSERT( privkey );
671  return *privkey;
672  }
673 
674  fc::ecc::private_key get_private_key_for_account(const account_object& account)const
675  {
676  vector<public_key_type> active_keys = account.active.get_keys();
677  if (active_keys.size() != 1)
678  FC_THROW("Expecting a simple authority with one active key");
679  return get_private_key(active_keys.front());
680  }
681 
682  // imports the private key into the wallet, and associate it in some way (?) with the
683  // given account name.
684  // @returns true if the key matches a current active/owner/memo key for the named
685  // account, false otherwise (but it is stored either way)
686  bool import_key(string account_name_or_id, string wif_key)
687  {
688  fc::optional<fc::ecc::private_key> optional_private_key = wif_to_key(wif_key);
689  if (!optional_private_key)
690  FC_THROW("Invalid private key");
691  graphene::chain::public_key_type wif_pub_key = optional_private_key->get_public_key();
692 
693  account_object account = get_account( account_name_or_id );
694 
695  // make a list of all current public keys for the named account
696  flat_set<public_key_type> all_keys_for_account;
697  std::vector<public_key_type> active_keys = account.active.get_keys();
698  std::vector<public_key_type> owner_keys = account.owner.get_keys();
699  std::copy(active_keys.begin(), active_keys.end(), std::inserter(all_keys_for_account, all_keys_for_account.end()));
700  std::copy(owner_keys.begin(), owner_keys.end(), std::inserter(all_keys_for_account, all_keys_for_account.end()));
701  all_keys_for_account.insert(account.options.memo_key);
702 
703  _keys[wif_pub_key] = wif_key;
704 
705  _wallet.update_account(account);
706 
707  _wallet.extra_keys[account.id].insert(wif_pub_key);
708 
709  return all_keys_for_account.find(wif_pub_key) != all_keys_for_account.end();
710  }
711 
712  vector< signed_transaction > import_balance( string name_or_id, const vector<string>& wif_keys, bool broadcast );
713 
714  bool load_wallet_file(string wallet_filename = "")
715  {
716  // TODO: Merge imported wallet with existing wallet,
717  // instead of replacing it
718  if( wallet_filename == "" )
719  wallet_filename = _wallet_filename;
720 
721  if( ! fc::exists( wallet_filename ) )
722  return false;
723 
724  _wallet = fc::json::from_file( wallet_filename ).as< wallet_data >( 2 * GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS );
725  if( _wallet.chain_id != _chain_id )
726  FC_THROW( "Wallet chain ID does not match",
727  ("wallet.chain_id", _wallet.chain_id)
728  ("chain_id", _chain_id) );
729 
730  size_t account_pagination = 100;
731  vector< std::string > account_ids_to_send;
732  size_t n = _wallet.my_accounts.size();
733  account_ids_to_send.reserve( std::min( account_pagination, n ) );
734  auto it = _wallet.my_accounts.begin();
735 
736  for( size_t start=0; start<n; start+=account_pagination )
737  {
738  size_t end = std::min( start+account_pagination, n );
739  assert( end > start );
740  account_ids_to_send.clear();
741  std::vector< account_object > old_accounts;
742  for( size_t i=start; i<end; i++ )
743  {
744  assert( it != _wallet.my_accounts.end() );
745  old_accounts.push_back( *it );
746  std::string account_id = account_id_to_string(old_accounts.back().id);
747  account_ids_to_send.push_back( account_id );
748  ++it;
749  }
750  std::vector< optional< account_object > > accounts = _remote_db->get_accounts(account_ids_to_send);
751  // server response should be same length as request
752  FC_ASSERT( accounts.size() == account_ids_to_send.size() );
753  size_t i = 0;
754  for( const optional< account_object >& acct : accounts )
755  {
756  account_object& old_acct = old_accounts[i];
757  if( !acct.valid() )
758  {
759  elog( "Could not find account ${id} : \"${name}\" does not exist on the chain!", ("id", old_acct.id)("name", old_acct.name) );
760  i++;
761  continue;
762  }
763  // this check makes sure the server didn't send results
764  // in a different order, or accounts we didn't request
765  FC_ASSERT( acct->id == old_acct.id );
766  if( fc::json::to_string(*acct) != fc::json::to_string(old_acct) )
767  {
768  wlog( "Account ${id} : \"${name}\" updated on chain", ("id", acct->id)("name", acct->name) );
769  }
770  _wallet.update_account( *acct );
771  i++;
772  }
773  }
774 
775  return true;
776  }
777 
778  void quit()
779  {
780  ilog( "Quitting Cli Wallet ..." );
781 
782  throw fc::canceled_exception();
783  }
784 
785  void save_wallet_file(string wallet_filename = "")
786  {
787  //
788  // Serialize in memory, then save to disk
789  //
790  // This approach lessens the risk of a partially written wallet
791  // if exceptions are thrown in serialization
792  //
793 
794  encrypt_keys();
795 
796  if( wallet_filename == "" )
797  wallet_filename = _wallet_filename;
798 
799  wlog( "saving wallet to file ${fn}", ("fn", wallet_filename) );
800 
801  string data = fc::json::to_pretty_string( _wallet );
802  try
803  {
804  enable_umask_protection();
805  //
806  // Parentheses on the following declaration fails to compile,
807  // due to the Most Vexing Parse. Thanks, C++
808  //
809  // http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Most_vexing_parse
810  //
811  fc::ofstream outfile{ fc::path( wallet_filename ) };
812  outfile.write( data.c_str(), data.length() );
813  outfile.flush();
814  outfile.close();
815  disable_umask_protection();
816  }
817  catch(...)
818  {
819  disable_umask_protection();
820  throw;
821  }
822  }
823 
824  transaction_handle_type begin_builder_transaction()
825  {
826  int trx_handle = _builder_transactions.empty()? 0
827  : (--_builder_transactions.end())->first + 1;
828  _builder_transactions[trx_handle];
829  return trx_handle;
830  }
831  void add_operation_to_builder_transaction(transaction_handle_type transaction_handle, const operation& op)
832  {
833  FC_ASSERT(_builder_transactions.count(transaction_handle));
834  _builder_transactions[transaction_handle].operations.emplace_back(op);
835  }
836  void replace_operation_in_builder_transaction(transaction_handle_type handle,
837  uint32_t operation_index,
838  const operation& new_op)
839  {
840  FC_ASSERT(_builder_transactions.count(handle));
841  signed_transaction& trx = _builder_transactions[handle];
842  FC_ASSERT( operation_index < trx.operations.size());
843  trx.operations[operation_index] = new_op;
844  }
845  asset set_fees_on_builder_transaction(transaction_handle_type handle, string fee_asset = GRAPHENE_SYMBOL)
846  {
847  FC_ASSERT(_builder_transactions.count(handle));
848 
849  auto fee_asset_obj = get_asset(fee_asset);
850  asset total_fee = fee_asset_obj.amount(0);
851 
852  auto gprops = _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters;
853  if( fee_asset_obj.get_id() != asset_id_type() )
854  {
855  for( auto& op : _builder_transactions[handle].operations )
856  total_fee += gprops.current_fees->set_fee( op, fee_asset_obj.options.core_exchange_rate );
857 
858  FC_ASSERT((total_fee * fee_asset_obj.options.core_exchange_rate).amount <=
859  get_object<asset_dynamic_data_object>(fee_asset_obj.dynamic_asset_data_id).fee_pool,
860  "Cannot pay fees in ${asset}, as this asset's fee pool is insufficiently funded.",
861  ("asset", fee_asset_obj.symbol));
862  } else {
863  for( auto& op : _builder_transactions[handle].operations )
864  total_fee += gprops.current_fees->set_fee( op );
865  }
866 
867  return total_fee;
868  }
869  transaction preview_builder_transaction(transaction_handle_type handle)
870  {
871  FC_ASSERT(_builder_transactions.count(handle));
872  return _builder_transactions[handle];
873  }
874  signed_transaction sign_builder_transaction(transaction_handle_type transaction_handle, bool broadcast = true)
875  {
876  FC_ASSERT(_builder_transactions.count(transaction_handle));
877 
878  return _builder_transactions[transaction_handle] = sign_transaction(_builder_transactions[transaction_handle], broadcast);
879  }
880 
881  pair<transaction_id_type,signed_transaction> broadcast_transaction(signed_transaction tx)
882  {
883  try {
884  _remote_net_broadcast->broadcast_transaction(tx);
885  }
886  catch (const fc::exception& e) {
887  elog("Caught exception while broadcasting tx ${id}: ${e}", ("id", tx.id().str())("e", e.to_detail_string()));
888  throw;
889  }
890  return std::make_pair(tx.id(),tx);
891  }
892 
893  signed_transaction propose_builder_transaction(
894  transaction_handle_type handle,
895  time_point_sec expiration = time_point::now() + fc::minutes(1),
896  uint32_t review_period_seconds = 0, bool broadcast = true)
897  {
898  FC_ASSERT(_builder_transactions.count(handle));
899  proposal_create_operation op;
900  op.expiration_time = expiration;
901  signed_transaction& trx = _builder_transactions[handle];
902  std::transform(trx.operations.begin(), trx.operations.end(), std::back_inserter(op.proposed_ops),
903  [](const operation& op) -> op_wrapper { return op; });
904  if( review_period_seconds )
905  op.review_period_seconds = review_period_seconds;
906  trx.operations = {op};
907  _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees->set_fee( trx.operations.front() );
908 
909  return trx = sign_transaction(trx, broadcast);
910  }
911 
912  signed_transaction propose_builder_transaction2(
913  transaction_handle_type handle,
914  string account_name_or_id,
915  time_point_sec expiration = time_point::now() + fc::minutes(1),
916  uint32_t review_period_seconds = 0, bool broadcast = true)
917  {
918  FC_ASSERT(_builder_transactions.count(handle));
919  proposal_create_operation op;
920  op.fee_paying_account = get_account(account_name_or_id).get_id();
921  op.expiration_time = expiration;
922  signed_transaction& trx = _builder_transactions[handle];
923  std::transform(trx.operations.begin(), trx.operations.end(), std::back_inserter(op.proposed_ops),
924  [](const operation& op) -> op_wrapper { return op; });
925  if( review_period_seconds )
926  op.review_period_seconds = review_period_seconds;
927  trx.operations = {op};
928  _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees->set_fee( trx.operations.front() );
929 
930  return trx = sign_transaction(trx, broadcast);
931  }

939  signed_transaction register_account(string name,
940  public_key_type owner,
941  public_key_type active,
942  string registrar_account,
943  string referrer_account,
944  uint32_t referrer_percent,
945  bool broadcast = false)
946  { try {
947  FC_ASSERT( !self.is_locked() );
948  FC_ASSERT( is_valid_name(name) );
949  account_create_operation account_create_op;
950 
951  // #449 referrer_percent is on 0-100 scale, if user has larger
952  // number it means their script is using GRAPHENE_100_PERCENT scale
953  // instead of 0-100 scale.
954  FC_ASSERT( referrer_percent <= 100 );
955  // TODO: process when pay_from_account is ID
956 
957  account_object registrar_account_object =
958  this->get_account( registrar_account );
959  FC_ASSERT( registrar_account_object.is_lifetime_member() );
960 
961  account_id_type registrar_account_id = registrar_account_object.id;
962 
963  account_object referrer_account_object =
964  this->get_account( referrer_account );
965  account_create_op.referrer = referrer_account_object.id;
966  account_create_op.referrer_percent = uint16_t( referrer_percent * GRAPHENE_1_PERCENT );
967 
968  account_create_op.registrar = registrar_account_id;
969  account_create_op.name = name;
970  account_create_op.owner = authority(1, owner, 1);
971  account_create_op.active = authority(1, active, 1);
972  account_create_op.options.memo_key = active;
973 
974  signed_transaction tx;
975 
976  tx.operations.push_back( account_create_op );
977 
978  auto current_fees = _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees;
979  set_operation_fees( tx, current_fees );
980 
981  vector<public_key_type> paying_keys = registrar_account_object.active.get_keys();
982 
983  auto dyn_props = get_dynamic_global_properties();
984  tx.set_reference_block( dyn_props.head_block_id );
985  tx.set_expiration( dyn_props.time + fc::seconds(30) );
986  tx.validate();
987 
988  for( public_key_type& key : paying_keys )
989  {
990  auto it = _keys.find(key);
991  if( it != _keys.end() )
992  {
993  fc::optional< fc::ecc::private_key > privkey = wif_to_key( it->second );
994  if( !privkey.valid() )
995  {
996  FC_ASSERT( false, "Malformed private key in _keys" );
997  }
998  tx.sign( *privkey, _chain_id );
999  }
1000  }
1001 
1002  if( broadcast )
1003  _remote_net_broadcast->broadcast_transaction( tx );
1004  return tx;
1005  } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (name)(owner)(active)(registrar_account)(referrer_account)(referrer_percent)(broadcast) ) }
1006

1008  signed_transaction upgrade_account(string name, bool broadcast)
1009  { try {
1010  FC_ASSERT( !self.is_locked() );
1011  account_object account_obj = get_account(name);
1012  FC_ASSERT( !account_obj.is_lifetime_member() );
1013 
1014  signed_transaction tx;
1015  account_upgrade_operation op;
1016  op.account_to_upgrade = account_obj.get_id();
1017  op.upgrade_to_lifetime_member = true;
1018  tx.operations = {op};
1019  set_operation_fees( tx, _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees );
1020  tx.validate();
1021 
1022  return sign_transaction( tx, broadcast );
1023  } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (name) ) }

1025 
1026  // This function generates derived keys starting with index 0 and keeps incrementing
1027  // the index until it finds a key that isn't registered in the block chain. To be
1028  // safer, it continues checking for a few more keys to make sure there wasn't a short gap
1029  // caused by a failed registration or the like.
1030  int find_first_unused_derived_key_index(const fc::ecc::private_key& parent_key)
1031  {
1032  int first_unused_index = 0;
1033  int number_of_consecutive_unused_keys = 0;
1034  for (int key_index = 0; ; ++key_index)
1035  {
1036  fc::ecc::private_key derived_private_key = derive_private_key(key_to_wif(parent_key), key_index);
1037  graphene::chain::public_key_type derived_public_key = derived_private_key.get_public_key();
1038  if( _keys.find(derived_public_key) == _keys.end() )
1039  {
1040  if (number_of_consecutive_unused_keys)
1041  {
1042  ++number_of_consecutive_unused_keys;
1043  if (number_of_consecutive_unused_keys > 5)
1044  return first_unused_index;
1045  }
1046  else
1047  {
1048  first_unused_index = key_index;
1049  number_of_consecutive_unused_keys = 1;
1050  }
1051  }
1052  else
1053  {
1054  // key_index is used
1055  first_unused_index = 0;
1056  number_of_consecutive_unused_keys = 0;
1057  }
1058  }
1059  }
1060 
1061  signed_transaction create_account_with_private_key(fc::ecc::private_key owner_privkey,
1062  string account_name,
1063  string registrar_account,
1064  string referrer_account,
1065  bool broadcast = false,
1066  bool save_wallet = true)
1067  { try {
1068  int active_key_index = find_first_unused_derived_key_index(owner_privkey);
1069  fc::ecc::private_key active_privkey = derive_private_key( key_to_wif(owner_privkey), active_key_index);
1070 
1071  int memo_key_index = find_first_unused_derived_key_index(active_privkey);
1072  fc::ecc::private_key memo_privkey = derive_private_key( key_to_wif(active_privkey), memo_key_index);
1073 
1074  graphene::chain::public_key_type owner_pubkey = owner_privkey.get_public_key();
1075  graphene::chain::public_key_type active_pubkey = active_privkey.get_public_key();
1076  graphene::chain::public_key_type memo_pubkey = memo_privkey.get_public_key();
1077 
1078  account_create_operation account_create_op;
1079 
1080  // TODO: process when pay_from_account is ID
1081 
1082  account_object registrar_account_object = get_account( registrar_account );
1083 
1084  account_id_type registrar_account_id = registrar_account_object.id;
1085 
1086  account_object referrer_account_object = get_account( referrer_account );
1087  account_create_op.referrer = referrer_account_object.id;
1088  account_create_op.referrer_percent = referrer_account_object.referrer_rewards_percentage;
1089 
1090  account_create_op.registrar = registrar_account_id;
1091  account_create_op.name = account_name;
1092  account_create_op.owner = authority(1, owner_pubkey, 1);
1093  account_create_op.active = authority(1, active_pubkey, 1);
1094  account_create_op.options.memo_key = memo_pubkey;
1095 
1096  // current_fee_schedule()
1097  // find_account(pay_from_account)
1098 
1099  // account_create_op.fee = account_create_op.calculate_fee(db.current_fee_schedule());
1100 
1101  signed_transaction tx;
1102 
1103  tx.operations.push_back( account_create_op );
1104 
1105  set_operation_fees( tx, _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees);
1106 
1107  vector<public_key_type> paying_keys = registrar_account_object.active.get_keys();
1108 
1109  auto dyn_props = get_dynamic_global_properties();
1110  tx.set_reference_block( dyn_props.head_block_id );
1111  tx.set_expiration( dyn_props.time + fc::seconds(30) );
1112  tx.validate();
1113 
1114  for( public_key_type& key : paying_keys )
1115  {
1116  auto it = _keys.find(key);
1117  if( it != _keys.end() )
1118  {
1119  fc::optional< fc::ecc::private_key > privkey = wif_to_key( it->second );
1120  FC_ASSERT( privkey.valid(), "Malformed private key in _keys" );
1121  tx.sign( *privkey, _chain_id );
1122  }
1123  }
1124 
1125  // we do not insert owner_privkey here because
1126  // it is intended to only be used for key recovery
1127  _wallet.pending_account_registrations[account_name].push_back(key_to_wif( active_privkey ));
1128  _wallet.pending_account_registrations[account_name].push_back(key_to_wif( memo_privkey ));
1129  if( save_wallet )
1130  save_wallet_file();
1131  if( broadcast )
1132  _remote_net_broadcast->broadcast_transaction( tx );
1133  return tx;
1134  } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (account_name)(registrar_account)(referrer_account)(broadcast) ) }

1136  signed_transaction create_account_with_brain_key(string brain_key,
1137  string account_name,
1138  string registrar_account,
1139  string referrer_account,
1140  bool broadcast = false,
1141  bool save_wallet = true)
1142  { try {
1143  FC_ASSERT( !self.is_locked() );
1144  string normalized_brain_key = normalize_brain_key( brain_key );
1145  // TODO: scan blockchain for accounts that exist with same brain key
1146  fc::ecc::private_key owner_privkey = derive_private_key( normalized_brain_key, 0 );
1147  return create_account_with_private_key(owner_privkey, account_name, registrar_account, referrer_account, broadcast, save_wallet);
1148  } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (account_name)(registrar_account)(referrer_account) ) }

1176  signed_transaction update_asset(string symbol,
1177  optional<string> new_issuer,
1178  asset_options new_options,
1179  bool broadcast /* = false */)
1180  { try {
1181  optional<asset_object> asset_to_update = find_asset(symbol);
1182  if (!asset_to_update)
1183  FC_THROW("No asset with that symbol exists!");
1184  optional<account_id_type> new_issuer_account_id;
1185  if (new_issuer)
1186  {
1187  FC_ASSERT( _remote_db->get_dynamic_global_properties().time < HARDFORK_CORE_199_TIME,
1188  "The use of 'new_issuer' is no longer supported. Please use `update_asset_issuer' instead!");
1189  account_object new_issuer_account = get_account(*new_issuer);
1190  new_issuer_account_id = new_issuer_account.id;
1191  }
1192 
1193  asset_update_operation update_op;
1194  update_op.issuer = asset_to_update->issuer;
1195  update_op.asset_to_update = asset_to_update->id;
1196  update_op.new_issuer = new_issuer_account_id;
1197  update_op.new_options = new_options;
1198 
1199  signed_transaction tx;
1200  tx.operations.push_back( update_op );
1201  set_operation_fees( tx, _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees);
1202  tx.validate();
1203 
1204  return sign_transaction( tx, broadcast );
1205  } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (symbol)(new_issuer)(new_options)(broadcast) ) }

1467  witness_object get_witness(string owner_account)
1468  {
1469  try
1470  {
1471  fc::optional<witness_id_type> witness_id = maybe_id<witness_id_type>(owner_account);
1472  if (witness_id)
1473  {
1474  std::vector<witness_id_type> ids_to_get;
1475  ids_to_get.push_back(*witness_id);
1476  std::vector<fc::optional<witness_object>> witness_objects = _remote_db->get_witnesses(ids_to_get);
1477  if (witness_objects.front())
1478  return *witness_objects.front();
1479  FC_THROW("No witness is registered for id ${id}", ("id", owner_account));
1480  }
1481  else
1482  {
1483  // then maybe it's the owner account
1484  try
1485  {
1486  std::string owner_account_id = account_id_to_string(get_account_id(owner_account));
1487  fc::optional<witness_object> witness = _remote_db->get_witness_by_account(owner_account_id);
1488  if (witness)
1489  return *witness;
1490  else
1491  FC_THROW("No witness is registered for account ${account}", ("account", owner_account));
1492  }
1493  catch (const fc::exception&)
1494  {
1495  FC_THROW("No account or witness named ${account}", ("account", owner_account));
1496  }
1497  }
1498  }
1499  FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (owner_account) )
1500  }
1501 
1502  committee_member_object get_committee_member(string owner_account)
1503  {
1504  try
1505  {
1506  fc::optional<committee_member_id_type> committee_member_id = maybe_id<committee_member_id_type>(owner_account);
1507  if (committee_member_id)
1508  {
1509  std::vector<committee_member_id_type> ids_to_get;
1510  ids_to_get.push_back(*committee_member_id);
1511  std::vector<fc::optional<committee_member_object>> committee_member_objects = _remote_db->get_committee_members(ids_to_get);
1512  if (committee_member_objects.front())
1513  return *committee_member_objects.front();
1514  FC_THROW("No committee_member is registered for id ${id}", ("id", owner_account));
1515  }
1516  else
1517  {
1518  // then maybe it's the owner account
1519  try
1520  {
1521  fc::optional<committee_member_object> committee_member = _remote_db->get_committee_member_by_account(owner_account);
1522  if (committee_member)
1523  return *committee_member;
1524  else
1525  FC_THROW("No committee_member is registered for account ${account}", ("account", owner_account));
1526  }
1527  catch (const fc::exception&)
1528  {
1529  FC_THROW("No account or committee_member named ${account}", ("account", owner_account));
1530  }
1531  }
1532  }
1533  FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (owner_account) )
1534  }

1536  signed_transaction create_witness(string owner_account,
1537  string url,
1538  bool broadcast /* = false */)
1539  { try {
1540  account_object witness_account = get_account(owner_account);
1541  fc::ecc::private_key active_private_key = get_private_key_for_account(witness_account);
1542  int witness_key_index = find_first_unused_derived_key_index(active_private_key);
1543  fc::ecc::private_key witness_private_key = derive_private_key(key_to_wif(active_private_key), witness_key_index);
1544  graphene::chain::public_key_type witness_public_key = witness_private_key.get_public_key();
1545 
1546  witness_create_operation witness_create_op;
1547  witness_create_op.witness_account = witness_account.id;
1548  witness_create_op.block_signing_key = witness_public_key;
1549  witness_create_op.url = url;
1550 
1551  if (_remote_db->get_witness_by_account(account_id_to_string(witness_create_op.witness_account)))
1552  FC_THROW("Account ${owner_account} is already a witness", ("owner_account", owner_account));
1553 
1554  signed_transaction tx;
1555  tx.operations.push_back( witness_create_op );
1556  set_operation_fees( tx, _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees);
1557  tx.validate();
1558 
1559  _wallet.pending_witness_registrations[owner_account] = key_to_wif(witness_private_key);
1560 
1561  return sign_transaction( tx, broadcast );
1562  } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (owner_account)(broadcast) ) }
1563

1579

1588  template<typename WorkerInit>
1589  static WorkerInit _create_worker_initializer( const variant& worker_settings )
1590  {
1591  WorkerInit result;
1592  from_variant( worker_settings, result, GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS );
1593  return result;
1594  }
1595 
1596  signed_transaction create_worker(
1597  string owner_account,
1598  time_point_sec work_begin_date,
1599  time_point_sec work_end_date,
1600  share_type daily_pay,
1601  string name,
1602  string url,
1603  variant worker_settings,
1604  bool broadcast
1605  )
1606  {
1607  worker_initializer init;
1608  std::string wtype = worker_settings["type"].get_string();
1609 
1610  // TODO: Use introspection to do this dispatch
1611  if( wtype == "burn" )
1612  init = _create_worker_initializer< burn_worker_initializer >( worker_settings );
1613  else if( wtype == "refund" )
1614  init = _create_worker_initializer< refund_worker_initializer >( worker_settings );
1615  else if( wtype == "vesting" )
1616  init = _create_worker_initializer< vesting_balance_worker_initializer >( worker_settings );
1617  else
1618  {
1619  FC_ASSERT( false, "unknown worker[\"type\"] value" );
1620  }
1621 
1622  worker_create_operation op;
1623  op.owner = get_account( owner_account ).id;
1624  op.work_begin_date = work_begin_date;
1625  op.work_end_date = work_end_date;
1626  op.daily_pay = daily_pay;
1627  op.name = name;
1628  op.url = url;
1629  op.initializer = init;
1630 
1631  signed_transaction tx;
1632  tx.operations.push_back( op );
1633  set_operation_fees( tx, _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees );
1634  tx.validate();
1635 
1636  return sign_transaction( tx, broadcast );
1637  }
1638 
1639  signed_transaction update_worker_votes(
1640  string account,
1641  worker_vote_delta delta,
1642  bool broadcast
1643  )
1644  {
1645  account_object acct = get_account( account );
1646 
1647  // you could probably use a faster algorithm for this, but flat_set is fast enough :)
1648  flat_set< worker_id_type > merged;
1649  merged.reserve( delta.vote_for.size() + delta.vote_against.size() + delta.vote_abstain.size() );
1650  for( const worker_id_type& wid : delta.vote_for )
1651  {
1652  bool inserted = merged.insert( wid ).second;
1653  FC_ASSERT( inserted, "worker ${wid} specified multiple times", ("wid", wid) );
1654  }
1655  for( const worker_id_type& wid : delta.vote_against )
1656  {
1657  bool inserted = merged.insert( wid ).second;
1658  FC_ASSERT( inserted, "worker ${wid} specified multiple times", ("wid", wid) );
1659  }
1660  for( const worker_id_type& wid : delta.vote_abstain )
1661  {
1662  bool inserted = merged.insert( wid ).second;
1663  FC_ASSERT( inserted, "worker ${wid} specified multiple times", ("wid", wid) );
1664  }
1665 
1666  // should be enforced by FC_ASSERT's above
1667  assert( merged.size() == delta.vote_for.size() + delta.vote_against.size() + delta.vote_abstain.size() );
1668 
1669  vector< object_id_type > query_ids;
1670  for( const worker_id_type& wid : merged )
1671  query_ids.push_back( wid );
1672 
1673  flat_set<vote_id_type> new_votes( acct.options.votes );
1674 
1675  fc::variants objects = _remote_db->get_objects( query_ids );
1676  for( const variant& obj : objects )
1677  {
1678  worker_object wo;
1679  from_variant( obj, wo, GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS );
1680  new_votes.erase( wo.vote_for );
1681  new_votes.erase( wo.vote_against );
1682  if( delta.vote_for.find( wo.id ) != delta.vote_for.end() )
1683  new_votes.insert( wo.vote_for );
1684  else if( delta.vote_against.find( wo.id ) != delta.vote_against.end() )
1685  new_votes.insert( wo.vote_against );
1686  else
1687  assert( delta.vote_abstain.find( wo.id ) != delta.vote_abstain.end() );
1688  }
1689 
1690  account_update_operation update_op;
1691  update_op.account = acct.id;
1692  update_op.new_options = acct.options;
1693  update_op.new_options->votes = new_votes;
1694 
1695  signed_transaction tx;
1696  tx.operations.push_back( update_op );
1697  set_operation_fees( tx, _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees );
1698  tx.validate();
1699 
1700  return sign_transaction( tx, broadcast );
1701  }
1702 
1703  vector< vesting_balance_object_with_info > get_vesting_balances( string account_name )
1704  { try {
1705  fc::optional<vesting_balance_id_type> vbid = maybe_id<vesting_balance_id_type>( account_name );
1706  std::vector<vesting_balance_object_with_info> result;
1707  fc::time_point_sec now = _remote_db->get_dynamic_global_properties().time;
1708 
1709  if( vbid )
1710  {
1711  result.emplace_back( get_object<vesting_balance_object>(*vbid), now );
1712  return result;
1713  }
1714 
1715  vector< vesting_balance_object > vbos = _remote_db->get_vesting_balances( account_name );
1716  if( vbos.size() == 0 )
1717  return result;
1718 
1719  for( const vesting_balance_object& vbo : vbos )
1720  result.emplace_back( vbo, now );
1721 
1722  return result;
1723  } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (account_name) )
1724  }

1757  signed_transaction vote_for_committee_member(string voting_account,
1758  string committee_member,
1759  bool approve,
1760  bool broadcast /* = false */)
1761  { try {
1762  account_object voting_account_object = get_account(voting_account);
1763  fc::optional<committee_member_object> committee_member_obj = _remote_db->get_committee_member_by_account(committee_member);
1764  if (!committee_member_obj)
1765  FC_THROW("Account ${committee_member} is not registered as a committee_member", ("committee_member", committee_member));
1766  if (approve)
1767  {
1768  auto insert_result = voting_account_object.options.votes.insert(committee_member_obj->vote_id);
1769  if (!insert_result.second)
1770  FC_THROW("Account ${account} was already voting for committee_member ${committee_member}", ("account", voting_account)("committee_member", committee_member));
1771  }
1772  else
1773  {
1774  unsigned votes_removed = voting_account_object.options.votes.erase(committee_member_obj->vote_id);
1775  if (!votes_removed)
1776  FC_THROW("Account ${account} is already not voting for committee_member ${committee_member}", ("account", voting_account)("committee_member", committee_member));
1777  }
1778  account_update_operation account_update_op;
1779  account_update_op.account = voting_account_object.id;
1780  account_update_op.new_options = voting_account_object.options;
1781 
1782  signed_transaction tx;
1783  tx.operations.push_back( account_update_op );
1784  set_operation_fees( tx, _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees);
1785  tx.validate();
1786 
1787  return sign_transaction( tx, broadcast );
1788  } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (voting_account)(committee_member)(approve)(broadcast) ) }

1824  signed_transaction set_voting_proxy(string account_to_modify,
1825  optional<string> voting_account,
1826  bool broadcast /* = false */)
1827  { try {
1828  account_object account_object_to_modify = get_account(account_to_modify);
1829  if (voting_account)
1830  {
1831  account_id_type new_voting_account_id = get_account_id(*voting_account);
1832  if (account_object_to_modify.options.voting_account == new_voting_account_id)
1833  FC_THROW("Voting proxy for ${account} is already set to ${voter}", ("account", account_to_modify)("voter", *voting_account));
1834  account_object_to_modify.options.voting_account = new_voting_account_id;
1835  }
1836  else
1837  {
1838  if (account_object_to_modify.options.voting_account == GRAPHENE_PROXY_TO_SELF_ACCOUNT)
1839  FC_THROW("Account ${account} is already voting for itself", ("account", account_to_modify));
1840  account_object_to_modify.options.voting_account = GRAPHENE_PROXY_TO_SELF_ACCOUNT;
1841  }
1842 
1843  account_update_operation account_update_op;
1844  account_update_op.account = account_object_to_modify.id;
1845  account_update_op.new_options = account_object_to_modify.options;
1846 
1847  signed_transaction tx;
1848  tx.operations.push_back( account_update_op );
1849  set_operation_fees( tx, _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees);
1850  tx.validate();
1851 
1852  return sign_transaction( tx, broadcast );
1853  } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (account_to_modify)(voting_account)(broadcast) ) }

1871  account_update_op.new_options = account_object_to_modify.options;

1875  set_operation_fees( tx, _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees);
1876  tx.validate();
1877 
1878  return sign_transaction( tx, broadcast );
1879  } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (account_to_modify)(desired_number_of_witnesses)(desired_number_of_committee_members)(broadcast) ) }
1880 
1881  signed_transaction sign_transaction(signed_transaction tx, bool broadcast = false)
1882  {
1883  set<public_key_type> pks = _remote_db->get_potential_signatures( tx );
1884  flat_set<public_key_type> owned_keys;
1885  owned_keys.reserve( pks.size() );
1886  std::copy_if( pks.begin(), pks.end(), std::inserter(owned_keys, owned_keys.end()),
1887  [this](const public_key_type& pk){ return _keys.find(pk) != _keys.end(); } );
1888  tx.signatures.clear();
1889  set<public_key_type> approving_key_set = _remote_db->get_required_signatures( tx, owned_keys );
1890 
1891  auto dyn_props = get_dynamic_global_properties();
1892  tx.set_reference_block( dyn_props.head_block_id );
1893 
1894  // first, some bookkeeping, expire old items from _recently_generated_transactions
1895  // since transactions include the head block id, we just need the index for keeping transactions unique
1896  // when there are multiple transactions in the same block. choose a time period that should be at
1897  // least one block long, even in the worst case. 2 minutes ought to be plenty.
1898  fc::time_point_sec oldest_transaction_ids_to_track(dyn_props.time - fc::minutes(2));
1899  auto oldest_transaction_record_iter = _recently_generated_transactions.get<timestamp_index>().lower_bound(oldest_transaction_ids_to_track);
1900  auto begin_iter = _recently_generated_transactions.get<timestamp_index>().begin();
1901  _recently_generated_transactions.get<timestamp_index>().erase(begin_iter, oldest_transaction_record_iter);
1902 
1903  uint32_t expiration_time_offset = 0;
1904  for (;;)
1905  {
1906  tx.set_expiration( dyn_props.time + fc::seconds(30 + expiration_time_offset) );
1907  tx.signatures.clear();
1908 
1909  for( const public_key_type& key : approving_key_set )
1910  tx.sign( get_private_key(key), _chain_id );
1911 
1912  graphene::chain::transaction_id_type this_transaction_id = tx.id();
1913  auto iter = _recently_generated_transactions.find(this_transaction_id);
1914  if (iter == _recently_generated_transactions.end())
1915  {
1916  // we haven't generated this transaction before, the usual case
1917  recently_generated_transaction_record this_transaction_record;
1918  this_transaction_record.generation_time = dyn_props.time;
1919  this_transaction_record.transaction_id = this_transaction_id;
1920  _recently_generated_transactions.insert(this_transaction_record);
1921  break;
1922  }
1923 
1924  // else we've generated a dupe, increment expiration time and re-sign it
1925  ++expiration_time_offset;
1926  }
1927 
1928  if( broadcast )
1929  {
1930  try
1931  {
1932  _remote_net_broadcast->broadcast_transaction( tx );
1933  }
1934  catch (const fc::exception& e)
1935  {
1936  elog("Caught exception while broadcasting tx ${id}: ${e}", ("id", tx.id().str())("e", e.to_detail_string()) );
1937  throw;
1938  }
1939  }
1940 
1941  return tx;
1942  }
1943 
1944  memo_data sign_memo(string from, string to, string memo)
1945  {
1946  FC_ASSERT( !self.is_locked() );
1947 
1948  memo_data md = memo_data();
1949 
1950  // get account memo key, if that fails, try a pubkey
1951  try {
1952  account_object from_account = get_account(from);
1953  md.from = from_account.options.memo_key;
1954  } catch (const fc::exception& e) {
1955  md.from = self.get_public_key( from );
1956  }
1957  // same as above, for destination key
1958  try {
1959  account_object to_account = get_account(to);
1960  md.to = to_account.options.memo_key;
1961  } catch (const fc::exception& e) {
1962  md.to = self.get_public_key( to );
1963  }
1964 
1965  md.set_message(get_private_key(md.from), md.to, memo);
1966  return md;
1967  }
1968 
1969  string read_memo(const memo_data& md)
1970  {
1971  FC_ASSERT(!is_locked());
1972  std::string clear_text;
1973 
1974  const memo_data *memo = &md;
1975 
1976  try {
1977  FC_ASSERT(_keys.count(memo->to) || _keys.count(memo->from), "Memo is encrypted to a key ${to} or ${from} not in this wallet.", ("to", memo->to)("from",memo->from));
1978  if( _keys.count(memo->to) ) {
1979  auto my_key = wif_to_key(_keys.at(memo->to));
1980  FC_ASSERT(my_key, "Unable to recover private key to decrypt memo. Wallet may be corrupted.");
1981  clear_text = memo->get_message(*my_key, memo->from);
1982  } else {
1983  auto my_key = wif_to_key(_keys.at(memo->from));
1984  FC_ASSERT(my_key, "Unable to recover private key to decrypt memo. Wallet may be corrupted.");
1985  clear_text = memo->get_message(*my_key, memo->to);
1986  }
1987  } catch (const fc::exception& e) {
1988  elog("Error when decrypting memo: ${e}", ("e", e.to_detail_string()));
1989  }
1990 
1991  return clear_text;
1992  }

1994  signed_transaction sell_asset(string seller_account,
1995  string amount_to_sell,
1996  string symbol_to_sell,
1997  string min_to_receive,
1998  string symbol_to_receive,
1999  uint32_t timeout_sec = 0,
2000  bool fill_or_kill = false,
2001  bool broadcast = false)
2002  {
2003  account_object seller = get_account( seller_account );
2004 
2005  limit_order_create_operation op;
2006  op.seller = seller.id;
2007  op.amount_to_sell = get_asset(symbol_to_sell).amount_from_string(amount_to_sell);
2008  op.min_to_receive = get_asset(symbol_to_receive).amount_from_string(min_to_receive);
2009  if( timeout_sec )
2010  op.expiration = fc::time_point::now() + fc::seconds(timeout_sec);
2011  op.fill_or_kill = fill_or_kill;
2012 
2013  signed_transaction tx;
2014  tx.operations.push_back(op);
2015  set_operation_fees( tx, _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees);
2016  tx.validate();
2017 
2018  return sign_transaction( tx, broadcast );
2019  }

2102  if( memo.size() )
2103  {
2104  xfer_op.memo = memo_data();
2105  xfer_op.memo->from = from_account.options.memo_key;
2106  xfer_op.memo->to = to_account.options.memo_key;
2107  xfer_op.memo->set_message(get_private_key(from_account.options.memo_key),
2108  to_account.options.memo_key, memo);
2109  }
2110 
2111  signed_transaction tx;
2112  tx.operations.push_back(xfer_op);
2113  set_operation_fees( tx, _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees);
2114  tx.validate();
2115 
2116  return sign_transaction(tx, broadcast);
2117  } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (from)(to)(amount)(asset_symbol)(memo)(broadcast) ) }

2149  std::map<string,std::function<string(fc::variant,const fc::variants&)>> get_result_formatters() const
2150  {

2152  m["help"] = [](variant result, const fc::variants& a)
2153  {
2154  return result.get_string();
2155  };

2157  m["gethelp"] = [](variant result, const fc::variants& a)
2158  {
2159  return result.get_string();
2160  };
2161 
2162  m["get_account_history"] = [this](variant result, const fc::variants& a)
2163  {
2164  auto r = result.as<vector<operation_detail>>( GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS );
2165  std::stringstream ss;
2166 
2167  for( operation_detail& d : r )
2168  {
2169  operation_history_object& i = d.op;
2170  auto b = _remote_db->get_block_header(i.block_num);
2171  FC_ASSERT(b);
2172  ss << b->timestamp.to_iso_string() << " ";
2173  i.op.visit(operation_printer(ss, *this, i.result));
2174  ss << " \n";
2175  }
2176 
2177  return ss.str();
2178  };
2179  m["get_relative_account_history"] = [this](variant result, const fc::variants& a)
2180  {
2181  auto r = result.as<vector<operation_detail>>( GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS );
2182  std::stringstream ss;
2183 
2184  for( operation_detail& d : r )
2185  {
2186  operation_history_object& i = d.op;
2187  auto b = _remote_db->get_block_header(i.block_num);
2188  FC_ASSERT(b);
2189  ss << b->timestamp.to_iso_string() << " ";
2190  i.op.visit(operation_printer(ss, *this, i.result));
2191  ss << " \n";
2192  }
2193 
2194  return ss.str();
2195  };
2196 
2197  m["get_account_history_by_operations"] = [this](variant result, const fc::variants& a) {
2198  auto r = result.as<account_history_operation_detail>( GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS );
2199  std::stringstream ss;
2200  ss << "total_count : ";
2201  ss << r.total_count;
2202  ss << " \n";
2203  ss << "result_count : ";
2204  ss << r.result_count;
2205  ss << " \n";

2207  operation_history_object& i = d.op;
2208  auto b = _remote_db->get_block_header(i.block_num);
2209  FC_ASSERT(b);
2210  ss << b->timestamp.to_iso_string() << " ";
2211  i.op.visit(operation_printer(ss, *this, i.result));
2212  ss << " transaction_id : ";
2213  ss << d.transaction_id.str();
2214  ss << " \n";
2215  }
2216 
2217  return ss.str();
2218  };

2220  m["list_account_balances"] = [this](variant result, const fc::variants& a)
2221  {
2222  auto r = result.as<vector<asset>>( GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS );
2223  vector<asset_object> asset_recs;

2225  return get_asset(a.asset_id);
2226  });
2227

2229  for( unsigned i = 0; i < asset_recs.size(); ++i )
2230  ss << asset_recs[i].amount_to_pretty_string(r[i]) << "\n";
2231

2233  };

2235  m["get_blind_balances"] = [this](variant result, const fc::variants& a)
2236  {
2237  auto r = result.as<vector<asset>>( GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS );
2238  vector<asset_object> asset_recs;
2239  std::transform(r.begin(), r.end(), std::back_inserter(asset_recs), [this](const asset& a) {
2240  return get_asset(a.asset_id);
2241  });
2242 
2243  std::stringstream ss;
2244  for( unsigned i = 0; i < asset_recs.size(); ++i )
2245  ss << asset_recs[i].amount_to_pretty_string(r[i]) << "\n";
2246 
2247  return ss.str();
2248  };
2249  m["transfer_to_blind"] = [this](variant result, const fc::variants& a)
2250  {
2251  auto r = result.as<blind_confirmation>( GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS );
2252  std::stringstream ss;
2253  r.trx.operations[0].visit( operation_printer( ss, *this, operation_result() ) );
2254  ss << "\n";
2255  for( const auto& out : r.outputs )
2256  {
2257  asset_object a = get_asset( out.decrypted_memo.amount.asset_id );

2259  }
2260  return ss.str();
2261  };

2263  {

2281  return ss.str();

2283  m["blind_history"] = [this](variant result, const fc::variants& a)
2284  {
2285  auto records = result.as<vector<blind_receipt>>( GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS );
2286  std::stringstream ss;
2287  ss << "WHEN "
2288  << " " << "AMOUNT" << " " << "FROM" << " => " << "TO" << " " << "MEMO" <<"\n";
2289  ss << "====================================================================================\n";
2290  for( auto& r : records )
2291  {
2292  asset_object as = get_asset( r.amount.asset_id );
2293  ss << fc::get_approximate_relative_time_string( r.date )
2294  << " " << as.amount_to_pretty_string( r.amount ) << " " << r.from_label << " => " << r.to_label << " " << r.memo <<"\n";
2295  }
2296  return ss.str();
2297  };
2298  m["get_order_book"] = [](variant result, const fc::variants& a)
2299  {
2300  auto orders = result.as<order_book>( GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS );
2301  auto bids = orders.bids;
2302  auto asks = orders.asks;
2303  std::stringstream ss;
2304  std::stringstream sum_stream;
2305  sum_stream << "Sum(" << orders.base << ')';
2306  double bid_sum = 0;
2307  double ask_sum = 0;
2308  const int spacing = 20;
2309 
2310  auto prettify_num = [&ss]( double n )
2311  {
2312  if (abs( round( n ) - n ) < 0.00000000001 )
2313  {
2314  ss << (int) n;
2315  }
2316  else if (n - floor(n) < 0.000001)
2317  {
2318  ss << setiosflags( ios::fixed ) << setprecision(10) << n;
2319  }
2320  else
2321  {
2322  ss << setiosflags( ios::fixed ) << setprecision(6) << n;
2323  }
2324  };
2325  auto prettify_num_string = [&]( string& num_string )
2326  {
2327  double n = fc::to_double( num_string );
2328  prettify_num( n );
2329  };
2330 
2331  ss << setprecision( 8 ) << setiosflags( ios::fixed ) << setiosflags( ios::left );
2332 
2333  ss << ' ' << setw( (spacing * 4) + 6 ) << "BUY ORDERS" << "SELL ORDERS\n"
2334  << ' ' << setw( spacing + 1 ) << "Price" << setw( spacing ) << orders.quote << ' ' << setw( spacing )
2335  << orders.base << ' ' << setw( spacing ) << sum_stream.str()
2336  << " " << setw( spacing + 1 ) << "Price" << setw( spacing ) << orders.quote << ' ' << setw( spacing )
2337  << orders.base << ' ' << setw( spacing ) << sum_stream.str()
2338  << "\n====================================================================================="
2339  << "|=====================================================================================\n";
2340 
2341  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < bids.size() || i < asks.size() ; i++)
2342  {
2343  if ( i < bids.size() )
2344  {
2345  bid_sum += fc::to_double( bids[i].base );
2346  ss << ' ' << setw( spacing );
2347  prettify_num_string( bids[i].price );
2348  ss << ' ' << setw( spacing );
2349  prettify_num_string( bids[i].quote );
2350  ss << ' ' << setw( spacing );
2351  prettify_num_string( bids[i].base );
2352  ss << ' ' << setw( spacing );
2353  prettify_num( bid_sum );
2354  ss << ' ';
2355  }
2356  else
2357  {
2358  ss << setw( (spacing * 4) + 5 ) << ' ';
2359  }
2360 
2361  ss << '|';
2362 
2363  if ( i < asks.size() )
2364  {
2365  ask_sum += fc::to_double( asks[i].base );
2366  ss << ' ' << setw( spacing );
2367  prettify_num_string( asks[i].price );
2368  ss << ' ' << setw( spacing );
2369  prettify_num_string( asks[i].quote );
2370  ss << ' ' << setw( spacing );
2371  prettify_num_string( asks[i].base );
2372  ss << ' ' << setw( spacing );
2373  prettify_num( ask_sum );
2374  }
2375 
2376  ss << '\n';
2377  }
2378 
2379  ss << endl
2380  << "Buy Total: " << bid_sum << ' ' << orders.base << endl
2381  << "Sell Total: " << ask_sum << ' ' << orders.base << endl;
2382 
2383  return ss.str();
2384  };
2385 
2386  return m;
2387  }

2389  signed_transaction propose_parameter_change(
2390  const string& proposing_account,
2391  fc::time_point_sec expiration_time,
2392  const variant_object& changed_values,
2393  bool broadcast = false)
2394  {
2395  FC_ASSERT( !changed_values.contains("current_fees") );
2396 
2397  const chain_parameters& current_params = get_global_properties().parameters;
2398  chain_parameters new_params = current_params;
2399  fc::reflector<chain_parameters>::visit(
2400  fc::from_variant_visitor<chain_parameters>( changed_values, new_params, GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS )
2401  );
2402 
2403  committee_member_update_global_parameters_operation update_op;
2404  update_op.new_parameters = new_params;
2405 
2406  proposal_create_operation prop_op;
2407 
2408  prop_op.expiration_time = expiration_time;
2409  prop_op.review_period_seconds = current_params.committee_proposal_review_period;
2410  prop_op.fee_paying_account = get_account(proposing_account).id;
2411 
2412  prop_op.proposed_ops.emplace_back( update_op );
2413  current_params.current_fees->set_fee( prop_op.proposed_ops.back().op );
2414 
2415  signed_transaction tx;
2416  tx.operations.push_back(prop_op);
2417  set_operation_fees(tx, current_params.current_fees);
2418  tx.validate();
2419 
2420  return sign_transaction(tx, broadcast);
2421  }
2422 
2423  signed_transaction propose_fee_change(
2424  const string& proposing_account,
2425  fc::time_point_sec expiration_time,
2426  const variant_object& changed_fees,
2427  bool broadcast = false)
2428  {
2429  const chain_parameters& current_params = get_global_properties().parameters;
2430  const fee_schedule_type& current_fees = *(current_params.current_fees);
2431 
2432  flat_map< int, fee_parameters > fee_map;
2433  fee_map.reserve( current_fees.parameters.size() );
2434  for( const fee_parameters& op_fee : current_fees.parameters )
2435  fee_map[ op_fee.which() ] = op_fee;
2436  uint32_t scale = current_fees.scale;
2437 
2438  for( const auto& item : changed_fees )
2439  {
2440  const string& key = item.key();
2441  if( key == "scale" )
2442  {
2443  int64_t _scale = item.value().as_int64();
2444  FC_ASSERT( _scale >= 0 );
2445  FC_ASSERT( _scale <= std::numeric_limits<uint32_t>::max() );
2446  scale = uint32_t( _scale );
2447  continue;
2448  }
2449  // is key a number?
2450  auto is_numeric = [&key]() -> bool
2451  {
2452  size_t n = key.size();
2453  for( size_t i=0; i<n; i++ )
2454  {
2455  if( !isdigit( key[i] ) )
2456  return false;
2457  }
2458  return true;
2459  };
2460 
2461  int which;
2462  if( is_numeric() )
2463  which = std::stoi( key );
2464  else
2465  {
2466  const auto& n2w = _operation_which_map.name_to_which;
2467  auto it = n2w.find( key );
2468  FC_ASSERT( it != n2w.end(), "unknown operation" );
2469  which = it->second;
2470  }
2471 
2472  fee_parameters fp = from_which_variant< fee_parameters >( which, item.value(), GRAPHENE_MAX_NESTED_OBJECTS );
2473  fee_map[ which ] = fp;
2474  }
2475 
2476  fee_schedule_type new_fees;
2477 
2478  for( const std::pair< int, fee_parameters >& item : fee_map )
2479  new_fees.parameters.insert( item.second );
2480  new_fees.scale = scale;
2481 
2482  chain_parameters new_params = current_params;
2483  new_params.current_fees = new_fees;
2484 
2485  committee_member_update_global_parameters_operation update_op;
2486  update_op.new_parameters = new_params;
2487 
2488  proposal_create_operation prop_op;
2489 
2490  prop_op.expiration_time = expiration_time;
2491  prop_op.review_period_seconds = current_params.committee_proposal_review_period;
2492  prop_op.fee_paying_account = get_account(proposing_account).id;
2493 
2494  prop_op.proposed_ops.emplace_back( update_op );
2495  current_params.current_fees->set_fee( prop_op.proposed_ops.back().op );
2496 
2497  signed_transaction tx;
2498  tx.operations.push_back(prop_op);
2499  set_operation_fees(tx, current_params.current_fees);
2500  tx.validate();
2501 
2502  return sign_transaction(tx, broadcast);
2503  }

2505  signed_transaction approve_proposal(
2506  const string& fee_paying_account,
2507  const string& proposal_id,
2508  const approval_delta& delta,
2509  bool broadcast = false)
2510  {
2511  proposal_update_operation update_op;
2512 
2513  update_op.fee_paying_account = get_account(fee_paying_account).id;
2514  update_op.proposal = fc::variant(proposal_id, 1).as<proposal_id_type>( 1 );
2515  // make sure the proposal exists
2516  get_object( update_op.proposal );
2517 
2518  for( const std::string& name : delta.active_approvals_to_add )
2519  update_op.active_approvals_to_add.insert( get_account( name ).id );
2520  for( const std::string& name : delta.active_approvals_to_remove )
2521  update_op.active_approvals_to_remove.insert( get_account( name ).id );
2522  for( const std::string& name : delta.owner_approvals_to_add )
2523  update_op.owner_approvals_to_add.insert( get_account( name ).id );
2524  for( const std::string& name : delta.owner_approvals_to_remove )
2525  update_op.owner_approvals_to_remove.insert( get_account( name ).id );
2526  for( const std::string& k : delta.key_approvals_to_add )
2527  update_op.key_approvals_to_add.insert( public_key_type( k ) );
2528  for( const std::string& k : delta.key_approvals_to_remove )
2529  update_op.key_approvals_to_remove.insert( public_key_type( k ) );
2530 
2531  signed_transaction tx;
2532  tx.operations.push_back(update_op);
2533  set_operation_fees(tx, get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees);
2534  tx.validate();
2535  return sign_transaction(tx, broadcast);
2536  }

2647  void flood_network(string prefix, uint32_t number_of_transactions)
2648  {
2649  try
2650  {
2651  const account_object& master = *_wallet.my_accounts.get<by_name>().lower_bound("import");
2652  int number_of_accounts = number_of_transactions / 3;
2653  number_of_transactions -= number_of_accounts;
2654  try {
2655  dbg_make_uia(master.name, "SHILL");
2656  } catch(...) {/* Ignore; the asset probably already exists.*/}
2657 
2658  fc::time_point start = fc::time_point::now();
2659  for( int i = 0; i < number_of_accounts; ++i )
2660  {
2661  std::ostringstream brain_key;
2662  brain_key << "brain key for account " << prefix << i;
2663  signed_transaction trx = create_account_with_brain_key(brain_key.str(), prefix + fc::to_string(i), master.name, master.name, /* broadcast = */ true, /* save wallet = */ false);
2664  }
2665  fc::time_point end = fc::time_point::now();
2666  ilog("Created ${n} accounts in ${time} milliseconds",
2667  ("n", number_of_accounts)("time", (end - start).count() / 1000));
2668 
2669  start = fc::time_point::now();
2670  for( int i = 0; i < number_of_accounts; ++i )
2671  {
2672  signed_transaction trx = transfer(master.name, prefix + fc::to_string(i), "10", "CORE", "", true);
2673  trx = transfer(master.name, prefix + fc::to_string(i), "1", "CORE", "", true);
2674  }
2675  end = fc::time_point::now();
2676  ilog("Transferred to ${n} accounts in ${time} milliseconds",
2677  ("n", number_of_accounts*2)("time", (end - start).count() / 1000));
2678 
2679  start = fc::time_point::now();
2680  for( int i = 0; i < number_of_accounts; ++i )
2681  {
2682  signed_transaction trx = issue_asset(prefix + fc::to_string(i), "1000", "SHILL", "", true);
2683  }
2684  end = fc::time_point::now();
2685  ilog("Issued to ${n} accounts in ${time} milliseconds",
2686  ("n", number_of_accounts)("time", (end - start).count() / 1000));
2687  }
2688  catch (...)
2689  {
2690  throw;
2691  }
2692 
2693  }

2732 template<typename T>
2733 std::string operation_printer::operator()(const T& op)const
2734 {
2735  //balance_accumulator acc;
2736  //op.get_balance_delta( acc, result );
2737  auto a = wallet.get_asset( op.fee.asset_id );
2738  auto payer = wallet.get_account( op.fee_payer() );
2739 
2740  string op_name = fc::get_typename<T>::name();
2741  if( op_name.find_last_of(':') != string::npos )
2742  op_name.erase(0, op_name.find_last_of(':')+1);
2743  out << op_name <<" ";
2744  // out << "balance delta: " << fc::json::to_string(acc.balance) <<" ";
2745  out << payer.name << " fee: " << a.amount_to_pretty_string( op.fee );
2746  operation_result_printer rprinter(wallet);
2747  std::string str_result = result.visit(rprinter);
2748  if( str_result != "" )
2749  {
2750  out << " result: " << str_result;
2751  }
2752  return "";
2753 }
2754 std::string operation_printer::operator()(const transfer_from_blind_operation& op)const

2757  auto receiver = wallet.get_account( op.to );

2761  return "";

2763 std::string operation_printer::operator()(const transfer_to_blind_operation& op)const
2764 {
2765  auto fa = wallet.get_asset( op.fee.asset_id );
2766  auto a = wallet.get_asset( op.amount.asset_id );
2767  auto sender = wallet.get_account( op.from );
2768 
2769  out << sender.name
2770  << " sent " << a.amount_to_pretty_string( op.amount ) << " to " << op.outputs.size() << " blinded balance" << (op.outputs.size()>1?"s":"")
2771  << " fee: " << fa.amount_to_pretty_string( op.fee );
2772  return "";
2773 }
2774 string operation_printer::operator()(const transfer_operation& op) const
2775 {
2776  out << "Transfer " << wallet.get_asset(op.amount.asset_id).amount_to_pretty_string(op.amount)
2777  << " from " << wallet.get_account(op.from).name << " to " << wallet.get_account(op.to).name;
2778  std::string memo;
2779  if( op.memo )
2780  {
2781  if( wallet.is_locked() )
2782  {
2783  out << " -- Unlock wallet to see memo.";
2784  } else {
2785  try {
2786  FC_ASSERT(wallet._keys.count(op.memo->to) || wallet._keys.count(op.memo->from), "Memo is encrypted to a key ${to} or ${from} not in this wallet.", ("to", op.memo->to)("from",op.memo->from));
2787  if( wallet._keys.count(op.memo->to) ) {
2788  auto my_key = wif_to_key(wallet._keys.at(op.memo->to));
2789  FC_ASSERT(my_key, "Unable to recover private key to decrypt memo. Wallet may be corrupted.");
2790  memo = op.memo->get_message(*my_key, op.memo->from);
2791  out << " -- Memo: " << memo;
2792  } else {
2793  auto my_key = wif_to_key(wallet._keys.at(op.memo->from));
2794  FC_ASSERT(my_key, "Unable to recover private key to decrypt memo. Wallet may be corrupted.");
2795  memo = op.memo->get_message(*my_key, op.memo->to);
2796  out << " -- Memo: " << memo;
2797  }
2798  } catch (const fc::exception& e) {
2799  out << " -- could not decrypt memo";
2800  }
2801  }
2802  }
2803  fee(op.fee);
2804  return memo;
2805 }
2806

2808 {
2809  out << "Create Account '" << op.name << "'";
2810  return fee(op.fee);

2847 namespace graphene { namespace wallet {
2848  vector<brain_key_info> utility::derive_owner_keys_from_brain_key(string brain_key, int number_of_desired_keys)
2849  {
2850  // Safety-check
2851  FC_ASSERT( number_of_desired_keys >= 1 );
2852 
2853  // Create as many derived owner keys as requested
2854  vector<brain_key_info> results;
2855  brain_key = graphene::wallet::detail::normalize_brain_key(brain_key);
2856  for (int i = 0; i < number_of_desired_keys; ++i) {
2857  fc::ecc::private_key priv_key = graphene::wallet::detail::derive_private_key( brain_key, i );
2858 
2859  brain_key_info result;
2860  result.brain_priv_key = brain_key;
2861  result.wif_priv_key = key_to_wif( priv_key );
2862  result.pub_key = priv_key.get_public_key();
2863 
2864  results.push_back(result);
2865  }
2866 
2867  return results;
2868  }
2869 
2870  brain_key_info utility::suggest_brain_key()
2871  {
2872  brain_key_info result;
2873  // create a private key for secure entropy
2874  fc::sha256 sha_entropy1 = fc::ecc::private_key::generate().get_secret();
2875  fc::sha256 sha_entropy2 = fc::ecc::private_key::generate().get_secret();
2876  fc::bigint entropy1(sha_entropy1.data(), sha_entropy1.data_size());
2877  fc::bigint entropy2(sha_entropy2.data(), sha_entropy2.data_size());
2878  fc::bigint entropy(entropy1);
2879  entropy <<= 8 * sha_entropy1.data_size();
2880  entropy += entropy2;
2881  string brain_key = "";
2882 
2883  for (int i = 0; i < BRAIN_KEY_WORD_COUNT; i++)
2884  {
2885  fc::bigint choice = entropy % graphene::words::word_list_size;
2886  entropy /= graphene::words::word_list_size;
2887  if (i > 0)
2888  brain_key += " ";
2889  brain_key += graphene::words::word_list[choice.to_int64()];
2890  }
2891 
2892  brain_key = detail::normalize_brain_key(brain_key);
2893  fc::ecc::private_key priv_key = detail::derive_private_key(brain_key, 0);
2894  result.brain_priv_key = brain_key;
2895  result.wif_priv_key = key_to_wif(priv_key);
2896  result.pub_key = priv_key.get_public_key();
2897  return result;
2898  }
2899 }}

2952 vector<operation_detail> wallet_api::get_account_history(string name, int limit)const
2953 {
2954  vector<operation_detail> result;
2955 
2956  while( limit > 0 )
2957  {
2958  bool skip_first_row = false;
2959  operation_history_id_type start;
2960  if( result.size() )
2961  {
2962  start = result.back().op.id;
2963  if( start == operation_history_id_type() ) // no more data
2964  break;
2965  start = start + (-1);
2966  if( start == operation_history_id_type() ) // will return most recent history if directly call remote API with this
2967  {
2968  start = start + 1;
2969  skip_first_row = true;
2970  }
2971  }
2972 
2973  int page_limit = skip_first_row ? std::min( 100, limit + 1 ) : std::min( 100, limit );
2974 
2975  vector<operation_history_object> current = my->_remote_hist->get_account_history( name, operation_history_id_type(),
2976  page_limit, start );
2977  bool first_row = true;
2978  for( auto& o : current )
2979  {
2980  if( first_row )
2981  {
2982  first_row = false;
2983  if( skip_first_row )
2984  {
2985  continue;
2986  }
2987  }
2988  std::stringstream ss;
2989  auto memo = o.op.visit(detail::operation_printer(ss, *my, o.result));
2990  result.push_back( operation_detail{ memo, ss.str(), o } );
2991  }
2992 
2993  if( int(current.size()) < page_limit )
2994  break;
2995 
2996  limit -= current.size();
2997  if( skip_first_row )
2998  ++limit;
2999  }
3000 
3001  return result;
3002 }
3003 
3004 vector<operation_detail> wallet_api::get_relative_account_history(string name, uint32_t stop, int limit, uint32_t start)const
3005 {
3006  vector<operation_detail> result;
3007  auto account_id = get_account(name).get_id();
3008 
3009  const account_object& account = my->get_account(account_id);
3010  const account_statistics_object& stats = my->get_object(account.statistics);
3011 
3012  if(start == 0)
3013  start = stats.total_ops;
3014  else
3015  start = std::min<uint32_t>(start, stats.total_ops);
3016 
3017  while( limit > 0 )
3018  {
3019  vector <operation_history_object> current = my->_remote_hist->get_relative_account_history(name, stop, std::min<uint32_t>(100, limit), start);
3020  for (auto &o : current) {
3021  std::stringstream ss;
3022  auto memo = o.op.visit(detail::operation_printer(ss, *my, o.result));
3023  result.push_back(operation_detail{memo, ss.str(), o});
3024  }
3025  if (current.size() < std::min<uint32_t>(100, limit))
3026  break;
3027  limit -= current.size();
3028  start -= 100;
3029  if( start == 0 ) break;
3030  }
3031  return result;
3032 }
3033 
3034 account_history_operation_detail wallet_api::get_account_history_by_operations(string name, vector<uint16_t> operation_types, uint32_t start, int limit)
3035 {
3036  account_history_operation_detail result;
3037  auto account_id = get_account(name).get_id();
3038 
3039  const auto& account = my->get_account(account_id);
3040  const auto& stats = my->get_object(account.statistics);
3041 
3042  // sequence of account_transaction_history_object start with 1
3043  start = start == 0 ? 1 : start;
3044 
3045  if (start <= stats.removed_ops) {
3046  start = stats.removed_ops;
3047  result.total_count =stats.removed_ops;
3048  }
3049 
3050  while (limit > 0 && start <= stats.total_ops) {
3051  uint32_t min_limit = std::min<uint32_t> (100, limit);
3052  auto current = my->_remote_hist->get_account_history_by_operations(name, operation_types, start, min_limit);
3053  for (auto& obj : current.operation_history_objs) {
3054  std::stringstream ss;
3055  auto memo = obj.op.visit(detail::operation_printer(ss, *my, obj.result));
3056 
3057  transaction_id_type transaction_id;
3058  auto block = get_block(obj.block_num);
3059  if (block.valid() && obj.trx_in_block < block->transaction_ids.size()) {
3060  transaction_id = block->transaction_ids[obj.trx_in_block];
3061  }
3062  result.details.push_back(operation_detail_ex{memo, ss.str(), obj, transaction_id});
3063  }
3064  result.result_count += current.operation_history_objs.size();
3065  result.total_count += current.total_count;
3066 
3067  start += current.total_count > 0 ? current.total_count : min_limit;
3068  limit -= current.operation_history_objs.size();
3069  }
3070 
3071  return result;
3072 }
