3234 bool wallet_api::import_key(string account_name_or_id, string wif_key)
3235 {
3236  FC_ASSERT(!is_locked());
3237  // backup wallet
3238  fc::optional<fc::ecc::private_key> optional_private_key = wif_to_key(wif_key);
3239  if (!optional_private_key)
3240  FC_THROW("Invalid private key");
3241  string shorthash = detail::address_to_shorthash(optional_private_key->get_public_key());
3242  copy_wallet_file( "before-import-key-" + shorthash );
3243 
3244  if( my->import_key(account_name_or_id, wif_key) )
3245  {
3246  save_wallet_file();
3247  copy_wallet_file( "after-import-key-" + shorthash );
3248  return true;
3249  }
3250  return false;
3251 }

3253 map<string, bool> wallet_api::import_accounts( string filename, string password )
3254 {
3255  FC_ASSERT( !is_locked() );
3256  FC_ASSERT( fc::exists( filename ) );
3257 
3258  const auto imported_keys = fc::json::from_file<exported_keys>( filename );
3259 
3260  const auto password_hash = fc::sha512::hash( password );
3261  FC_ASSERT( fc::sha512::hash( password_hash ) == imported_keys.password_checksum );
3262 
3263  map<string, bool> result;
3264  for( const auto& item : imported_keys.account_keys )
3265  {
3266  const auto import_this_account = [ & ]() -> bool
3267  {
3268  try
3269  {
3270  const account_object account = get_account( item.account_name );
3271  const auto& owner_keys = account.owner.get_keys();
3272  const auto& active_keys = account.active.get_keys();
3273 
3274  for( const auto& public_key : item.public_keys )
3275  {
3276  if( std::find( owner_keys.begin(), owner_keys.end(), public_key ) != owner_keys.end() )
3277  return true;
3278 
3279  if( std::find( active_keys.begin(), active_keys.end(), public_key ) != active_keys.end() )
3280  return true;
3281  }
3282  }
3283  catch( ... )
3284  {
3285  }
3286 
3287  return false;
3288  };
3289 
3290  const auto should_proceed = import_this_account();
3291  result[ item.account_name ] = should_proceed;
3292 
3293  if( should_proceed )
3294  {
3295  uint32_t import_successes = 0;
3296  uint32_t import_failures = 0;
3297  // TODO: First check that all private keys match public keys
3298  for( const auto& encrypted_key : item.encrypted_private_keys )
3299  {
3300  try
3301  {
3302  const auto plain_text = fc::aes_decrypt( password_hash, encrypted_key );
3303  const auto private_key = fc::raw::unpack<private_key_type>( plain_text );
3304 
3305  import_key( item.account_name, string( graphene::utilities::key_to_wif( private_key ) ) );
3306  ++import_successes;
3307  }
3308  catch( const fc::exception& e )
3309  {
3310  elog( "Couldn't import key due to exception ${e}", ("e", e.to_detail_string()) );
3311  ++import_failures;
3312  }
3313  }
3314  ilog( "successfully imported ${n} keys for account ${name}", ("n", import_successes)("name", item.account_name) );
3315  if( import_failures > 0 )
3316  elog( "failed to import ${n} keys for account ${name}", ("n", import_failures)("name", item.account_name) );
3317  }
3318  }
3319 
3320  return result;
3321 }
3322 
3323 bool wallet_api::import_account_keys( string filename, string password, string src_account_name, string dest_account_name )
3324 {
3325  FC_ASSERT( !is_locked() );
3326  FC_ASSERT( fc::exists( filename ) );
3327 
3328  bool is_my_account = false;
3329  const auto accounts = list_my_accounts();
3330  for( const auto& account : accounts )
3331  {
3332  if( account.name == dest_account_name )
3333  {
3334  is_my_account = true;
3335  break;
3336  }
3337  }
3338  FC_ASSERT( is_my_account );
3339 
3340  const auto imported_keys = fc::json::from_file<exported_keys>( filename );
3341 
3342  const auto password_hash = fc::sha512::hash( password );
3343  FC_ASSERT( fc::sha512::hash( password_hash ) == imported_keys.password_checksum );
3344 
3345  bool found_account = false;
3346  for( const auto& item : imported_keys.account_keys )
3347  {
3348  if( item.account_name != src_account_name )
3349  continue;
3350 
3351  found_account = true;
3352 
3353  for( const auto& encrypted_key : item.encrypted_private_keys )
3354  {
3355  const auto plain_text = fc::aes_decrypt( password_hash, encrypted_key );
3356  const auto private_key = fc::raw::unpack<private_key_type>( plain_text );
3357 
3358  my->import_key( dest_account_name, string( graphene::utilities::key_to_wif( private_key ) ) );
3359  }
3360 
3361  return true;
3362  }
3363  save_wallet_file();
3364 
3365  FC_ASSERT( found_account );
3366 
3367  return false;
3368 }

3735 string wallet_api::help()const
3736 {
3737  std::vector<std::string> method_names = my->method_documentation.get_method_names();
3738  std::stringstream ss;
3739  for (const std::string method_name : method_names)
3740  {
3741  try
3742  {
3743  ss << my->method_documentation.get_brief_description(method_name);
3744  }
3745  catch (const fc::key_not_found_exception&)
3746  {
3747  ss << method_name << " (no help available)\n";
3748  }
3749  }
3750  return ss.str();
3751 }
3752 
3753 string wallet_api::gethelp(const string& method)const
3754 {
3755  fc::api<wallet_api> tmp;
3756  std::stringstream ss;
3757  ss << "\n";
3758 
3759  if( method == "import_key" )
3760  {
3761  ss << "usage: import_key ACCOUNT_NAME_OR_ID WIF_PRIVATE_KEY\n\n";
3762  ss << "example: import_key \"1.3.11\" 5KQwrPbwdL6PhXujxW37FSSQZ1JiwsST4cqQzDeyXtP79zkvFD3\n";
3763  ss << "example: import_key \"usera\" 5KQwrPbwdL6PhXujxW37FSSQZ1JiwsST4cqQzDeyXtP79zkvFD3\n";
3764  }
3765  else if( method == "transfer" )
3766  {
3767  ss << "usage: transfer FROM TO AMOUNT SYMBOL \"memo\" BROADCAST\n\n";
3768  ss << "example: transfer \"1.3.11\" \"1.3.4\" 1000.03 CORE \"memo\" true\n";
3769  ss << "example: transfer \"usera\" \"userb\" 1000.123 CORE \"memo\" true\n";
3770  }
3771  else if( method == "create_account_with_brain_key" )
3772  {
3773  ss << "usage: create_account_with_brain_key BRAIN_KEY ACCOUNT_NAME REGISTRAR REFERRER BROADCAST\n\n";
3774  ss << "example: create_account_with_brain_key \"my really long brain key\" \"newaccount\" \"1.3.11\" \"1.3.11\" true\n";
3775  ss << "example: create_account_with_brain_key \"my really long brain key\" \"newaccount\" \"someaccount\" \"otheraccount\" true\n";
3776  ss << "\n";
3777  ss << "This method should be used if you would like the wallet to generate new keys derived from the brain key.\n";
3778  ss << "The BRAIN_KEY will be used as the owner key, and the active key will be derived from the BRAIN_KEY. Use\n";
3779  ss << "register_account if you already know the keys you know the public keys that you would like to register.\n";
3780 
3781  }
3782  else if( method == "register_account" )
3783  {
3784  ss << "usage: register_account ACCOUNT_NAME OWNER_PUBLIC_KEY ACTIVE_PUBLIC_KEY REGISTRAR REFERRER REFERRER_PERCENT BROADCAST\n\n";
3785  ss << "example: register_account \"newaccount\" \"CORE6MRyAjQq8ud7hVNYcfnVPJqcVpscN5So8BhtHuGYqET5GDW5CV\" \"CORE6MRyAjQq8ud7hVNYcfnVPJqcVpscN5So8BhtHuGYqET5GDW5CV\" \"1.3.11\" \"1.3.11\" 50 true\n";
3786  ss << "\n";
3787  ss << "Use this method to register an account for which you do not know the private keys.";
3788  }
3789  else if( method == "create_asset" )
3790  {
3791  ss << "usage: ISSUER SYMBOL PRECISION_DIGITS OPTIONS BITASSET_OPTIONS BROADCAST\n\n";
3792  ss << "PRECISION_DIGITS: the number of digits after the decimal point\n\n";
3793  ss << "Example value of OPTIONS: \n";
3794  ss << fc::json::to_pretty_string( graphene::chain::asset_options() );
3795  ss << "\nExample value of BITASSET_OPTIONS: \n";
3796  ss << fc::json::to_pretty_string( graphene::chain::bitasset_options() );
3797  ss << "\nBITASSET_OPTIONS may be null\n";
3798  }
3799  else
3800  {
3801  std::string doxygenHelpString = my->method_documentation.get_detailed_description(method);
3802  if (!doxygenHelpString.empty())
3803  ss << doxygenHelpString;
3804  else
3805  ss << "No help defined for method " << method << "\n";
3806  }
3807 
3808  return ss.str();
3809 }

3845 
3846 void wallet_api::lock()
3847 { try {
3848  FC_ASSERT( !is_locked() );
3849  encrypt_keys();
3850  for( auto key : my->_keys )
3851  key.second = key_to_wif(fc::ecc::private_key());
3852  my->_keys.clear();
3853  my->_checksum = fc::sha512();
3854  my->self.lock_changed(true);
3855 } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW() }
3856 
3857 void wallet_api::unlock(string password)
3858 { try {
3859  FC_ASSERT(password.size() > 0);
3860  auto pw = fc::sha512::hash(password.c_str(), password.size());
3861  vector<char> decrypted = fc::aes_decrypt(pw, my->_wallet.cipher_keys);
3862  auto pk = fc::raw::unpack<plain_keys>(decrypted);
3863  FC_ASSERT(pk.checksum == pw);
3864  my->_keys = std::move(pk.keys);
3865  my->_checksum = pk.checksum;
3866  my->self.lock_changed(false);
3867 } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW() }
3868 
3869 void wallet_api::set_password( string password )
3870 {
3871  if( !is_new() )
3872  FC_ASSERT( !is_locked(), "The wallet must be unlocked before the password can be set" );
3873  my->_checksum = fc::sha512::hash( password.c_str(), password.size() );
3874  lock();
3875 }
3876 
3877 vector< signed_transaction > wallet_api::import_balance( string name_or_id, const vector<string>& wif_keys, bool broadcast )
3878 {
3879  return my->import_balance( name_or_id, wif_keys, broadcast );
3880 }
3881 
3882 namespace detail {
3883 
3884 vector< signed_transaction > wallet_api_impl::import_balance( string name_or_id, const vector<string>& wif_keys, bool broadcast )
3885 { try {
3886  FC_ASSERT(!is_locked());
3887  const dynamic_global_property_object& dpo = _remote_db->get_dynamic_global_properties();
3888  account_object claimer = get_account( name_or_id );
3889  uint32_t max_ops_per_tx = 30;
3890 
3891  map< address, private_key_type > keys; // local index of address -> private key
3892  vector< address > addrs;
3893  bool has_wildcard = false;
3894  addrs.reserve( wif_keys.size() );
3895  for( const string& wif_key : wif_keys )
3896  {
3897  if( wif_key == "*" )
3898  {
3899  if( has_wildcard )
3900  continue;
3901  for( const public_key_type& pub : _wallet.extra_keys[ claimer.id ] )
3902  {
3903  addrs.push_back( pub );
3904  auto it = _keys.find( pub );
3905  if( it != _keys.end() )
3906  {
3907  fc::optional< fc::ecc::private_key > privkey = wif_to_key( it->second );
3908  FC_ASSERT( privkey );
3909  keys[ addrs.back() ] = *privkey;
3910  }
3911  else
3912  {
3913  wlog( "Somehow _keys has no private key for extra_keys public key ${k}", ("k", pub) );
3914  }
3915  }
3916  has_wildcard = true;
3917  }
3918  else
3919  {
3920  optional< private_key_type > key = wif_to_key( wif_key );
3921  FC_ASSERT( key.valid(), "Invalid private key" );
3922  fc::ecc::public_key pk = key->get_public_key();
3923  addrs.push_back( pk );
3924  keys[addrs.back()] = *key;
3925  // see chain/balance_evaluator.cpp
3926  addrs.push_back( pts_address( pk, false, 56 ) );
3927  keys[addrs.back()] = *key;
3928  addrs.push_back( pts_address( pk, true, 56 ) );
3929  keys[addrs.back()] = *key;
3930  addrs.push_back( pts_address( pk, false, 0 ) );
3931  keys[addrs.back()] = *key;
3932  addrs.push_back( pts_address( pk, true, 0 ) );
3933  keys[addrs.back()] = *key;
3934  }
3935  }
3936 
3937  vector< balance_object > balances = _remote_db->get_balance_objects( addrs );
3938  addrs.clear();
3939 
3940  set<asset_id_type> bal_types;
3941  for( auto b : balances ) bal_types.insert( b.balance.asset_id );
3942 
3943  struct claim_tx
3944  {
3945  vector< balance_claim_operation > ops;
3946  set< address > addrs;
3947  };
3948  vector< claim_tx > claim_txs;
3949 
3950  for( const asset_id_type& a : bal_types )
3951  {
3952  balance_claim_operation op;
3953  op.deposit_to_account = claimer.id;
3954  for( const balance_object& b : balances )
3955  {
3956  if( b.balance.asset_id == a )
3957  {
3958  op.total_claimed = b.available( dpo.time );
3959  if( op.total_claimed.amount == 0 )
3960  continue;
3961  op.balance_to_claim = b.id;
3962  op.balance_owner_key = keys[b.owner].get_public_key();
3963  if( (claim_txs.empty()) || (claim_txs.back().ops.size() >= max_ops_per_tx) )
3964  claim_txs.emplace_back();
3965  claim_txs.back().ops.push_back(op);
3966  claim_txs.back().addrs.insert(b.owner);
3967  }
3968  }
3969  }
3970 
3971  vector< signed_transaction > result;
3972 
3973  for( const claim_tx& ctx : claim_txs )
3974  {
3975  signed_transaction tx;
3976  tx.operations.reserve( ctx.ops.size() );
3977  for( const balance_claim_operation& op : ctx.ops )
3978  tx.operations.emplace_back( op );
3979  set_operation_fees( tx, _remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees );
3980  tx.validate();
3981  signed_transaction signed_tx = sign_transaction( tx, false );
3982  for( const address& addr : ctx.addrs )
3983  signed_tx.sign( keys[addr], _chain_id );
3984  // if the key for a balance object was the same as a key for the account we're importing it into,
3985  // we may end up with duplicate signatures, so remove those
3986  boost::erase(signed_tx.signatures, boost::unique<boost::return_found_end>(boost::sort(signed_tx.signatures)));
3987  result.push_back( signed_tx );
3988  if( broadcast )
3989  _remote_net_broadcast->broadcast_transaction(signed_tx);
3990  }
3991 
3992  return result;
3993 } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (name_or_id) ) }
3994 
3995 }

4078 bool wallet_api::set_key_label( public_key_type key, string label )
4079 {
4080  auto result = my->_wallet.labeled_keys.insert( key_label{label,key} );
4081  if( result.second ) return true;
4082 
4083  auto key_itr = my->_wallet.labeled_keys.get<by_key>().find(key);
4084  auto label_itr = my->_wallet.labeled_keys.get<by_label>().find(label);
4085  if( label_itr == my->_wallet.labeled_keys.get<by_label>().end() )
4086  {
4087  if( key_itr != my->_wallet.labeled_keys.get<by_key>().end() )
4088  return my->_wallet.labeled_keys.get<by_key>().modify( key_itr, [&]( key_label& obj ){ obj.label = label; } );
4089  }
4090  return false;
4091 }

4111 public_key_type wallet_api::create_blind_account( string label, string brain_key )
4112 {
4113  FC_ASSERT( !is_locked() );
4114 
4115  auto label_itr = my->_wallet.labeled_keys.get<by_label>().find(label);
4116  if( label_itr != my->_wallet.labeled_keys.get<by_label>().end() )
4117  FC_ASSERT( !"Key with label already exists" );
4118  brain_key = fc::trim_and_normalize_spaces( brain_key );
4119  auto secret = fc::sha256::hash( brain_key.c_str(), brain_key.size() );
4120  auto priv_key = fc::ecc::private_key::regenerate( secret );
4121  public_key_type pub_key = priv_key.get_public_key();
4122 
4123  FC_ASSERT( set_key_label( pub_key, label ) );
4124 
4125  my->_keys[pub_key] = graphene::utilities::key_to_wif( priv_key );
4126 
4127  save_wallet_file();
4128  return pub_key;

4131 vector<asset> wallet_api::get_blind_balances( string key_or_label )
4132 {
4133  vector<asset> result;
4134  map<asset_id_type, share_type> balances;
4135 
4136  vector<commitment_type> used;
4137 
4138  auto pub_key = get_public_key( key_or_label );
4139  auto& to_asset_used_idx = my->_wallet.blind_receipts.get<by_to_asset_used>();
4140  auto start = to_asset_used_idx.lower_bound( std::make_tuple(pub_key,asset_id_type(0),false) );
4141  auto end = to_asset_used_idx.lower_bound( std::make_tuple(pub_key,asset_id_type(uint32_t(0xffffffff)),true) );
4142  while( start != end )
4143  {
4144  if( !start->used )
4145  {
4146  auto answer = my->_remote_db->get_blinded_balances( {start->commitment()} );
4147  if( answer.size() )
4148  balances[start->amount.asset_id] += start->amount.amount;
4149  else
4150  used.push_back( start->commitment() );
4151  }
4152  ++start;
4153  }
4154  for( const auto& u : used )
4155  {
4156  auto itr = my->_wallet.blind_receipts.get<by_commitment>().find( u );
4157  my->_wallet.blind_receipts.modify( itr, []( blind_receipt& r ){ r.used = true; } );
4158  }
4159  for( auto item : balances )
4160  result.push_back( asset( item.second, item.first ) );
4161  return result;
4162 }

4164 blind_confirmation wallet_api::transfer_from_blind( string from_blind_account_key_or_label,
4165  string to_account_id_or_name,
4166  string amount_in,
4167  string symbol,
4168  bool broadcast )
4169 { try {
4170  transfer_from_blind_operation from_blind;
4171 
4172 
4173  auto fees = my->_remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees;
4174  fc::optional<asset_object> asset_obj = get_asset(symbol);
4175  FC_ASSERT(asset_obj.valid(), "Could not find asset matching ${asset}", ("asset", symbol));
4176  auto amount = asset_obj->amount_from_string(amount_in);
4177 
4178  from_blind.fee = fees->calculate_fee( from_blind, asset_obj->options.core_exchange_rate );
4179 
4180  auto blind_in = asset_obj->amount_to_string( from_blind.fee + amount );
4181 
4182 
4183  auto conf = blind_transfer_help( from_blind_account_key_or_label,

4190  from_blind.amount = amount;
4191  from_blind.blinding_factor = conf.outputs.back().decrypted_memo.blinding_factor;
4192  from_blind.inputs.push_back( {conf.outputs.back().decrypted_memo.commitment, authority() } );
4193  from_blind.fee = fees->calculate_fee( from_blind, asset_obj->options.core_exchange_rate );

4202

4204

4210  public_key_type from_key = get_public_key(from_blind_account_key_or_label);
4211  conf_output.confirmation.to = from_key;

4215  //try {

4217  //} catch ( ... ){}
4218  }

4221 } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (from_blind_account_key_or_label)(to_account_id_or_name)(amount_in)(symbol) ) }

4223 blind_confirmation wallet_api::blind_transfer( string from_key_or_label,
4224  string to_key_or_label,
4225  string amount_in,
4226  string symbol,
4227  bool broadcast )
4228 {
4229  return blind_transfer_help( from_key_or_label, to_key_or_label, amount_in, symbol, broadcast, false );

4231 blind_confirmation wallet_api::blind_transfer_help( string from_key_or_label,
4232  string to_key_or_label,
4233  string amount_in,
4234  string symbol,
4235  bool broadcast,
4236  bool to_temp )
4237 {
4238  blind_confirmation confirm;
4239  try {
4240 
4241  FC_ASSERT( !is_locked() );
4242  public_key_type from_key = get_public_key(from_key_or_label);
4243  public_key_type to_key = get_public_key(to_key_or_label);
4244 
4245  fc::optional<asset_object> asset_obj = get_asset(symbol);
4246  FC_ASSERT(asset_obj.valid(), "Could not find asset matching ${asset}", ("asset", symbol));
4247 
4248  blind_transfer_operation blind_tr;
4249  blind_tr.outputs.resize(2);
4250 
4251  auto fees = my->_remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees;
4252 
4253  auto amount = asset_obj->amount_from_string(amount_in);
4254 
4255  asset total_amount = asset_obj->amount(0);
4256 
4257  vector<fc::sha256> blinding_factors;
4258 
4259  //auto from_priv_key = my->get_private_key( from_key );
4260 
4261  blind_tr.fee = fees->calculate_fee( blind_tr, asset_obj->options.core_exchange_rate );
4262 
4263  vector<commitment_type> used;
4264 
4265  auto& to_asset_used_idx = my->_wallet.blind_receipts.get<by_to_asset_used>();
4266  auto start = to_asset_used_idx.lower_bound( std::make_tuple(from_key,amount.asset_id,false) );
4267  auto end = to_asset_used_idx.lower_bound( std::make_tuple(from_key,amount.asset_id,true) );
4268  while( start != end )
4269  {
4270  auto result = my->_remote_db->get_blinded_balances( {start->commitment() } );
4271  if( result.size() == 0 )
4272  {
4273  used.push_back( start->commitment() );
4274  }
4275  else
4276  {
4277  blind_tr.inputs.push_back({start->commitment(), start->control_authority});
4278  blinding_factors.push_back( start->data.blinding_factor );
4279  total_amount += start->amount;
4280 
4281  if( total_amount >= amount + blind_tr.fee )
4282  break;
4283  }
4284  ++start;
4285  }
4286  for( const auto& u : used )
4287  {
4288  auto itr = my->_wallet.blind_receipts.get<by_commitment>().find( u );
4289  my->_wallet.blind_receipts.modify( itr, []( blind_receipt& r ){ r.used = true; } );
4290  }
4291 
4292  FC_ASSERT( total_amount >= amount+blind_tr.fee, "Insufficient Balance", ("available",total_amount)("amount",amount)("fee",blind_tr.fee) );
4293 
4294  auto one_time_key = fc::ecc::private_key::generate();
4295  auto secret = one_time_key.get_shared_secret( to_key );
4296  auto child = fc::sha256::hash( secret );
4297  auto nonce = fc::sha256::hash( one_time_key.get_secret() );
4298  auto blind_factor = fc::sha256::hash( child );
4299 
4300  auto from_secret = one_time_key.get_shared_secret( from_key );
4301  auto from_child = fc::sha256::hash( from_secret );
4302  auto from_nonce = fc::sha256::hash( nonce );
4303 
4304  auto change = total_amount - amount - blind_tr.fee;
4305  fc::sha256 change_blind_factor;
4306  fc::sha256 to_blind_factor;
4307  if( change.amount > 0 )
4308  {
4309  idump(("to_blind_factor")(blind_factor) );
4310  blinding_factors.push_back( blind_factor );
4311  change_blind_factor = fc::ecc::blind_sum( blinding_factors, blinding_factors.size() - 1 );
4312  wdump(("change_blind_factor")(change_blind_factor) );
4313  }
4314  else // change == 0
4315  {
4316  blind_tr.outputs.resize(1);
4317  blind_factor = fc::ecc::blind_sum( blinding_factors, blinding_factors.size() );
4318  idump(("to_sum_blind_factor")(blind_factor) );
4319  blinding_factors.push_back( blind_factor );
4320  idump(("nochange to_blind_factor")(blind_factor) );
4321  }
4322  fc::ecc::public_key from_pub_key = from_key;
4323  fc::ecc::public_key to_pub_key = to_key;
4324 
4325  blind_output to_out;
4326  to_out.owner = to_temp ? authority() : authority( 1, public_key_type( to_pub_key.child( child ) ), 1 );
4327  to_out.commitment = fc::ecc::blind( blind_factor, amount.amount.value );
4328  idump(("to_out.blind")(blind_factor)(to_out.commitment) );
4329 
4330 
4331  if( blind_tr.outputs.size() > 1 )
4332  {
4333  to_out.range_proof = fc::ecc::range_proof_sign( 0, to_out.commitment, blind_factor, nonce,
4334  0, RANGE_PROOF_MANTISSA, amount.amount.value );
4335 
4336  blind_output change_out;
4337  change_out.owner = authority( 1, public_key_type( from_pub_key.child( from_child ) ), 1 );
4338  change_out.commitment = fc::ecc::blind( change_blind_factor, change.amount.value );
4339  change_out.range_proof = fc::ecc::range_proof_sign( 0, change_out.commitment, change_blind_factor, from_nonce,
4340  0, RANGE_PROOF_MANTISSA, change.amount.value );
4341  blind_tr.outputs[1] = change_out;
4342 
4343 
4344  blind_confirmation::output conf_output;
4345  conf_output.label = from_key_or_label;
4346  conf_output.pub_key = from_key;
4347  conf_output.decrypted_memo.from = from_key;
4348  conf_output.decrypted_memo.amount = change;
4349  conf_output.decrypted_memo.blinding_factor = change_blind_factor;
4350  conf_output.decrypted_memo.commitment = change_out.commitment;
4351  conf_output.decrypted_memo.check = from_secret._hash[0];
4352  conf_output.confirmation.one_time_key = one_time_key.get_public_key();
4353  conf_output.confirmation.to = from_key;
4354  conf_output.confirmation.encrypted_memo = fc::aes_encrypt( from_secret, fc::raw::pack( conf_output.decrypted_memo ) );
4355  conf_output.auth = change_out.owner;
4356  conf_output.confirmation_receipt = conf_output.confirmation;
4357 
4358  confirm.outputs.push_back( conf_output );
4359  }
4360  blind_tr.outputs[0] = to_out;
4361 
4362  blind_confirmation::output conf_output;
4363  conf_output.label = to_key_or_label;
4364  conf_output.pub_key = to_key;
4365  conf_output.decrypted_memo.from = from_key;
4366  conf_output.decrypted_memo.amount = amount;
4367  conf_output.decrypted_memo.blinding_factor = blind_factor;
4368  conf_output.decrypted_memo.commitment = to_out.commitment;
4369  conf_output.decrypted_memo.check = secret._hash[0];
4370  conf_output.confirmation.one_time_key = one_time_key.get_public_key();
4371  conf_output.confirmation.to = to_key;
4372  conf_output.confirmation.encrypted_memo = fc::aes_encrypt( secret, fc::raw::pack( conf_output.decrypted_memo ) );
4373  conf_output.auth = to_out.owner;
4374  conf_output.confirmation_receipt = conf_output.confirmation;
4375 
4376  confirm.outputs.push_back( conf_output );
4377 
4379  std::sort( blind_tr.outputs.begin(), blind_tr.outputs.end(),
4380  [&]( const blind_output& a, const blind_output& b ){ return a.commitment < b.commitment; } );
4381  std::sort( blind_tr.inputs.begin(), blind_tr.inputs.end(),
4382  [&]( const blind_input& a, const blind_input& b ){ return a.commitment < b.commitment; } );
4383 
4384  confirm.trx.operations.emplace_back( std::move(blind_tr) );
4385  ilog( "validate before" );
4386  confirm.trx.validate();
4387  confirm.trx = sign_transaction(confirm.trx, broadcast);
4388 
4389  if( broadcast )
4390  {
4391  for( const auto& out : confirm.outputs )
4392  {
4393  try { receive_blind_transfer( out.confirmation_receipt, from_key_or_label, "" ); } catch ( ... ){}
4394  }
4395  }
4396 
4397  return confirm;
4398 } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (from_key_or_label)(to_key_or_label)(amount_in)(symbol)(broadcast)(confirm) ) }

4406 blind_confirmation wallet_api::transfer_to_blind( string from_account_id_or_name,
4407  string asset_symbol,
4409  vector<pair<string, string>> to_amounts,
4410  bool broadcast )
4411 { try {
4412  FC_ASSERT( !is_locked() );
4413  idump((to_amounts));
4414 
4415  blind_confirmation confirm;
4416  account_object from_account = my->get_account(from_account_id_or_name);
4417 
4418  fc::optional<asset_object> asset_obj = get_asset(asset_symbol);
4419  FC_ASSERT(asset_obj, "Could not find asset matching ${asset}", ("asset", asset_symbol));
4420 
4421  transfer_to_blind_operation bop;
4422  bop.from = from_account.id;
4423 
4424  vector<fc::sha256> blinding_factors;
4425 
4426  asset total_amount = asset_obj->amount(0);
4427 
4428  for( auto item : to_amounts )
4429  {
4430  auto one_time_key = fc::ecc::private_key::generate();
4431  auto to_key = get_public_key( item.first );
4432  auto secret = one_time_key.get_shared_secret( to_key );
4433  auto child = fc::sha256::hash( secret );
4434  auto nonce = fc::sha256::hash( one_time_key.get_secret() );
4435  auto blind_factor = fc::sha256::hash( child );
4436 
4437  blinding_factors.push_back( blind_factor );
4438 
4439  auto amount = asset_obj->amount_from_string(item.second);
4440  total_amount += amount;
4441 
4442 
4443  fc::ecc::public_key to_pub_key = to_key;
4444  blind_output out;
4445  out.owner = authority( 1, public_key_type( to_pub_key.child( child ) ), 1 );
4446  out.commitment = fc::ecc::blind( blind_factor, amount.amount.value );
4447  if( to_amounts.size() > 1 )
4448  out.range_proof = fc::ecc::range_proof_sign( 0, out.commitment, blind_factor, nonce,
4449  0, RANGE_PROOF_MANTISSA, amount.amount.value );
4450 
4451  blind_confirmation::output conf_output;
4452  conf_output.label = item.first;
4453  conf_output.pub_key = to_key;
4454  conf_output.decrypted_memo.amount = amount;
4455  conf_output.decrypted_memo.blinding_factor = blind_factor;
4456  conf_output.decrypted_memo.commitment = out.commitment;
4457  conf_output.decrypted_memo.check = secret._hash[0];
4458  conf_output.confirmation.one_time_key = one_time_key.get_public_key();
4459  conf_output.confirmation.to = to_key;
4460  conf_output.confirmation.encrypted_memo = fc::aes_encrypt( secret, fc::raw::pack( conf_output.decrypted_memo ) );
4461  conf_output.confirmation_receipt = conf_output.confirmation;
4462 
4463  confirm.outputs.push_back( conf_output );
4464 
4465  bop.outputs.push_back(out);
4466  }
4467  bop.amount = total_amount;
4468  bop.blinding_factor = fc::ecc::blind_sum( blinding_factors, blinding_factors.size() );
4469 
4471  std::sort( bop.outputs.begin(), bop.outputs.end(),
4472  [&]( const blind_output& a, const blind_output& b ){ return a.commitment < b.commitment; } );
4473 
4474  confirm.trx.operations.push_back( bop );
4475  my->set_operation_fees( confirm.trx, my->_remote_db->get_global_properties().parameters.current_fees);
4476  confirm.trx.validate();
4477  confirm.trx = sign_transaction(confirm.trx, broadcast);
4478 
4479  if( broadcast )
4480  {
4481  for( const auto& out : confirm.outputs )
4482  {
4483  try { receive_blind_transfer( out.confirmation_receipt, "@"+from_account.name, "from @"+from_account.name ); } catch ( ... ){}
4484  }
4485  }
4486 
4487  return confirm;
4488 } FC_CAPTURE_AND_RETHROW( (from_account_id_or_name)(asset_symbol)(to_amounts) ) }
4489 
4490 blind_receipt wallet_api::receive_blind_transfer( string confirmation_receipt, string opt_from, string opt_memo )
4491 {
4492  FC_ASSERT( !is_locked() );
4493  stealth_confirmation conf(confirmation_receipt);
4494  FC_ASSERT( conf.to );
4495 
4496  blind_receipt result;
4497  result.conf = conf;
4498 
4499  auto to_priv_key_itr = my->_keys.find( *conf.to );
4500  FC_ASSERT( to_priv_key_itr != my->_keys.end(), "No private key for receiver", ("conf",conf) );
4501 
4502 
4503  auto to_priv_key = wif_to_key( to_priv_key_itr->second );
4504  FC_ASSERT( to_priv_key );
4505 
4506  auto secret = to_priv_key->get_shared_secret( conf.one_time_key );
4507  auto child = fc::sha256::hash( secret );
4508 
4509  auto child_priv_key = to_priv_key->child( child );
4510  //auto blind_factor = fc::sha256::hash( child );
4511 
4512  auto plain_memo = fc::aes_decrypt( secret, conf.encrypted_memo );
4513  auto memo = fc::raw::unpack<stealth_confirmation::memo_data>( plain_memo );
4514 
4515  result.to_key = *conf.to;
4516  result.to_label = get_key_label( result.to_key );
4517  if( memo.from )
4518  {
4519  result.from_key = *memo.from;
4520  result.from_label = get_key_label( result.from_key );
4521  if( result.from_label == string() )
4522  {
4523  result.from_label = opt_from;
4524  set_key_label( result.from_key, result.from_label );
4525  }
4526  }
4527  else
4528  {
4529  result.from_label = opt_from;
4530  }
4531  result.amount = memo.amount;
4532  result.memo = opt_memo;
4533 
4534  // confirm the amount matches the commitment (verify the blinding factor)
4535  auto commtiment_test = fc::ecc::blind( memo.blinding_factor, memo.amount.amount.value );
4536  FC_ASSERT( fc::ecc::verify_sum( {commtiment_test}, {memo.commitment}, 0 ) );
4537 
4538  blind_balance bal;
4539  bal.amount = memo.amount;
4540  bal.to = *conf.to;
4541  if( memo.from ) bal.from = *memo.from;
4542  bal.one_time_key = conf.one_time_key;
4543  bal.blinding_factor = memo.blinding_factor;
4544  bal.commitment = memo.commitment;
4545  bal.used = false;
4546 
4547  auto child_pubkey = child_priv_key.get_public_key();
4548  auto owner = authority(1, public_key_type(child_pubkey), 1);
4549  result.control_authority = owner;
4550  result.data = memo;
4551 
4552  auto child_key_itr = owner.key_auths.find( child_pubkey );
4553  if( child_key_itr != owner.key_auths.end() )
4554  my->_keys[child_key_itr->first] = key_to_wif( child_priv_key );
4555 
4556  // my->_wallet.blinded_balances[memo.amount.asset_id][bal.to].push_back( bal );
4557 
4558  result.date = fc::time_point::now();
4559  my->_wallet.blind_receipts.insert( result );
4560  my->_keys[child_pubkey] = key_to_wif( child_priv_key );
4561 
4562  save_wallet_file();
4563 
4564  return result;
4565 }
4566 
4567 vector<blind_receipt> wallet_api::blind_history( string key_or_account )
4568 {
4569  vector<blind_receipt> result;
4570  auto pub_key = get_public_key( key_or_account );
4571 
4572  if( pub_key == public_key_type() )
4573  return vector<blind_receipt>();
4574 
4575  for( auto& r : my->_wallet.blind_receipts )
4576  {
4577  if( r.from_key == pub_key || r.to_key == pub_key )
4578  result.push_back( r );
4579  }
4580  std::sort( result.begin(), result.end(), [&]( const blind_receipt& a, const blind_receipt& b ){ return a.date > b.date; } );
4581  return result;
4582 }
